 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">8</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\Fc\74131649504_P66484_1869189\5449-1-kt-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:16 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Attachment&nbsp;A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">GENERAL RELEASE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS,&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (the &#147;Executive&#148;) has
been employed by Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Northwest&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive&#146;s employment with Northwest has
terminated; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive and Northwest have reached a full and
final compromise and settlement of all matters, disputes, causes of action,
claims, contentions and differences between them and Northwest&#146;s divisions,
merged entities and affiliates, subsidiaries, parents, branches, predecessors,
successors, assigns, officers, directors, trustees, employees, agents,
stockholders, administrators, representatives, attorneys, insurers or
fiduciaries, past, present or future (the &#147;Released Parties&#148;), including but
not limited to any and all claims arising from or derivative of Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest and his termination from employment with Northwest;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, in return for Northwest performing its
obligations as provided for herein and as set forth in the Management
Compensation Agreement dated as of&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;, 2001, by and between
Northwest and Executive (the &#147;Agreement&#148;), Executive will execute and comply
fully with the terms of this General Release (the &#147;Release&#148;);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive (i)&nbsp;understands that in executing
the Release he is, inter alia, giving up rights and claims under the Age
Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, as amended, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;621 <i>et seq. </i>(&#147;ADEA&#148;),
and (ii)&nbsp;has been given a period of not less than twenty-one
(21)&nbsp;days within which to consider this Release;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing and for
other good and valuable consideration, Executive and Northwest agree and
covenant as follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">By
entering into this Release, the Released Parties do not admit, and each
specifically denies any liability, wrongdoing or violation of any law, statute,
regulations, agreement or policy.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest shall be terminated effective&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; ,&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; .</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In
consideration of the obligations of Executive as set forth in this Release and
the Agreement, and in full settlement and final satisfaction of any and all
claims, contractual or otherwise, which Executive had, has or may have against
Northwest and/or the Released Parties with respect to his employment, termination
from employment with Northwest, or otherwise arising on or prior to the date of
execution of this Release, Northwest shall pay to Executive the payments and
benefits to which Executive is entitled under the Agreement. This Release shall
not pertain to any claim alleging that Northwest has failed to comply with any
obligations created by this Release or that Northwest has failed to pay to
Executive the payments and benefits to which Executive is entitled under the
Agreement upon termination of Executive&#146;s employment.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)
Executive, for and in consideration of the payments as set forth in the
Agreement and for other good and valuable consideration, hereby releases and
forever discharges and covenants not to sue, and by this Release does release and
forever discharge, the Released Parties of and from all debts, obligations,
promises, covenants, collective bargaining obligations, agreements, contracts,
endorsements, bonds, controversies, suits or causes of actions known or
unknown, suspected or unsuspected, of every kind and nature whatsoever, which
may heretofore have existed or which may now exist, including but not limited
to those arising under the ADEA, Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as
amended, 42 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2000e, <i>et
seq.</i>, Executive Order 11246, 30 Fed. Reg. 12319; the Employee
Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;1001, <i>et seq.</i>, the
Americans With Disabilities Act, as amended, 42 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;12101, <i>et seq.</i>, the Federal Equal Pay Act, 29
U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2061, <i>et seq.</i>,
the Reconstruction Era Civil Rights Act, as amended, 42 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;1981, </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">9</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\Fc\74131649504_P66484_1869189\5449-1-kt-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:16 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">et&nbsp;seq.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;701, <i>et seq.</i>, the
Family and Medical Leave Act of 1992, 29 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2601, <i>et seq.</i>, the Minnesota Human Rights Act,
Minn. Stat. Section&nbsp;363.01, <i>et seq.</i>,
and any all state or local constitutions and/or laws regarding employment
discrimination and/or federal, state or local constitutions and/or laws of any
type or description regarding employment as well as any claim for breach of
contract, wrongful discharge, breach of any express or implied promise,
misrepresentation, fraud, whistleblowing, retaliation, violation of public
policy, infliction of emotional distress, defamation, promissory estoppel,
invasion of privacy or any other theory or claim, whether legal or equitable,
including but not limited to any claims arising from or derivative of Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest and Executive&#146;s termination of employment with
Northwest or otherwise. Executive acknowledges that he has not been
discriminated against on the basis of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity,
religion or any other protected class status.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Without
in any way limiting the foregoing, this Release shall not affect any present or
future indemnification obligations that Northwest and the Released Parties may
have to Executive pursuant to any charter, by-law, agreement or policy of
insurance.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This
Release shall not affect Executive&#146;s rights under one or more Non-Qualified
Stock Option Agreements, Deferred Stock Award Agreement or Phantom Stock Unit
Award Agreement between Northwest and the Executive governing the terms of any
stock option grant or other stock award outstanding on the date hereof, which
rights shall continue to be governed by the terms of the agreement applicable
to such stock option or other stock award.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive
covenants and agrees not to sue nor authorize any other party, either
governmental or otherwise, to file any grievances, arbitration or commence any
other proceeding, administrative or judicial, against the Released Parties in
any court of law or equity, or before any administrative agency, with respect
to any matter relating to this Agreement or to matters occurring during Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The
Released Parties and Executive understand and agree that the terms of this
Release and the Agreement are confidential.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive
agrees not to make any untruthful or disparaging statements, written or oral,
about Northwest, the Released Parties or Northwest&#146;s personnel policies and
practices to any of Northwest&#146;s customers, competitors, suppliers, employees,
former employees, or the press or other media. Except as herein contemplated,
Executive also agrees that he will not voluntarily participate in any
proceeding of any kind brought against the Released Parties relating to this
Agreement or to matters occurring during Executive&#146;s employment with Northwest.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a) The
parties agree that this Release should be construed in accordance with the laws
of the State of Minnesota, exclusive of Minnesota choice of law provisions.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The
parties agree that any and all further legal proceedings between Executive and
the Released Parties, whether arising under statute, constitutions, contract,
common law or otherwise, including the issue of arbitrability, will be
submitted for resolution exclusively pursuant to the arbitration provision
contained in the Agreement. The parties hereby waive their right to a trial of
any and all claims arising out of this Release or breach of this Release.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Should
any provision of this Release be found to be in violation of any law, or
ineffective or barred for any reason whatsoever, the remainder of this Release
shall be in full force and effect to the maximum extent permitted by law.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Northwest
and Executive agree to execute such other documents to take such other actions
as may be reasonably necessary to further the purposes of this Release.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)
Executive acknowledges and agrees that, in deciding to execute this Release, he
has had the opportunity to consult with legal, financial and other personal
advisors of his own choosing as he </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">10</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\Fc\74131649504_P66484_1869189\5449-1-kt-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:16 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">deems appropriate, in assessing whether to execute this Release.
Executive represents and acknowledges that no representations, statement,
promise, inducement, threat or suggestion has been made by Northwest or the
Released Parties to influence him to sign this Release except such statements
as are expressly set forth herein. Executive agrees that he has been given a
minimum of twenty-one (21)&nbsp;days within which to consider the terms and
effects of this Release insofar as it relates to settlement and release of
potential claims under the ADEA, and to consult with, and to ask any questions
that he may have of anyone, including legal counsel and other personal advisors
of his own choosing, and that he has executed this Release voluntarily and with
full understanding of its terms and effects.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive
has the right to rescind this Release as far as it extends to potential claims
under Minn. Stat. Ch. 363 (prohibiting discrimination in employment) by written
notice to the Company within 15 calendars days following the execution of this
Release. Executive also has the right to revoke this Release as far as it extends
to potential claims under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;621 <i>et seq.</i>, by
informing the Company of his intent to revoke this Release within seven
calendar days following the execution of this Release. To be effective, notice,
rescission or revocation must be in writing and must be delivered either by
hand or by mail to Douglas M. Steenland, Executive Vice President&nbsp;&amp;
Chief Corporate Officer of Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., Department A1180,
5101 Northwest Drive, St. Paul, Minnesota, 55111-3034, within the specified
period. If a notice of rescission or revocation is delivered by mail, it must
be: (i)&nbsp;postmarked within the 15 or 7&nbsp;day period, respectively,
(ii)&nbsp;properly addressed to Mr.&nbsp;Steenland as set forth above, and
(iii)&nbsp;sent by certified mail return receipt requested. This Release shall
not become effective or enforceable until the 15 or 7&nbsp;day periods
described above have expired. No payments shall be due, owing or paid by
Northwest unless and until this Release becomes effective.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Release may not be changed or modified, except by a written
instrument signed by Executive and Northwest.</font></p>

<body lang="EN-US" style=" text-justify-trim:punctuation">

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.24</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">MANAGEMENT
COMPENSATION AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">between</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">and</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PHILIP C. HAAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">dated as of</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">January&nbsp;14,
2002</font></b></p>

</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-ku-01.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 11:15 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">MANAGEMENT
COMPENSATION AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">MANAGEMENT COMPENSATION AGREEMENT made as of the 14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;day of
January, 2002 between Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation
(the &#147;<i>Company</i>&#148;) and Philip C.
Haan (the &#147;<i>Executive</i>&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PREAMBLE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The Company and Executive hereby desire to enter into a
Management Compensation Agreement dated as of January&nbsp;14, 2002.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Terms of Employment</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Employment.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; The Company agrees to continue to employ
Executive, and Executive agrees to continue to serve the Company, on the terms
and conditions set forth herein.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Position and Duties.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; During the term of Executive&#146;s employment
hereunder, Executive shall continue to have his title, powers and duties as on
the Effective Date or such other powers and duties as may from time to time be
prescribed by the Company, provided that such powers and duties are consistent
with or represent a promotion from Executive&#146;s powers and duties as of the
Effective Date, unless otherwise consented to in writing by Executive; <i>provided, however,</i> that as long as
Executive retains a substantial portion of his then current oversight
responsibility, the Company shall be permitted to transfer a portion of
Executive&#146;s oversight responsibility without the consent of Executive.
Executive shall devote substantially all his working time and effort to the
business and affairs of the Company and its affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Compensation</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Base Salary.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive&#146;s Base Salary shall be his base
salary in effect on the Effective Date, as increased thereafter by the Company.
Executive&#146;s Base Salary in effect from time to time may only be reduced in
connection with a base wage reduction for salaried employees of the Company, by
an amount not to exceed 20% of Base Salary in effect on the date of such wage
reduction. For purposes of calculating any other payments or benefits hereunder
(except as specified in Section&nbsp;2.4) any reductions in Base Salary shall
be disregarded. Executive&#146;s Base Salary shall be payable in accordance with the
Company&#146;s payroll policies.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Bonus.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive shall be entitled to participate in
the Company&#146;s Key Employee Annual Cash Incentive Plan (the &#147;KEACIP&#148;) or any
successor annual bonus plan, the terms and conditions of which shall be
established by the Board from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Expenses.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; During the term of Executive&#146;s employment
hereunder, Executive shall be entitled to receive prompt reimbursements for all
reasonable expenses incurred in performing services hereunder, <i>provided</i> that Executive properly accounts
therefor in accordance with Company policy.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.4</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Compensation and Benefit Programs of the Company.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Except as
set forth below, Executive shall continue while employed hereunder to
participate in the Company&#146;s employee compensation and benefit programs (or any
successor programs) at levels in effect on the Effective Date. Exceptions to
the preceding sentence are:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Amounts payable to Executive under the Company&#146;s
benefit programs may be reduced to reflect a benefit reduction for salaried
employees of the Company, in the same manner that salaried employees are
generally affected by such reduction.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive shall not participate in any severance
pay plan or annual bonus plan maintained by the Company except to the extent
necessary to receive any severance or bonus payments specifically provided for
hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Other Benefits</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Airline Pass.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive shall be entitled to receive upon
termination of employment lifetime airline pass privileges for the personal use
of Executive and his or her spouse or registered domestic partner and dependent
children so long as spouses, registered domestic partners and dependent
children of employees generally are eligible for nonrevenue travel pursuant to
the Company&#146;s pass policies (hereinafter, &#147;Eligible Individuals&#148;). Such airline
pass privileges (the &#147;Airline Pass&#148;) shall entitle Executive and Eligible
Individuals to travel on regularly scheduled Northwest domestic and
international flights, subject to all charges and fees then applicable to
active management employees of the Company and their dependents and pursuant to
the Company&#146;s pass policies in effect from time to time, with boarding priority
of F-1 or the equivalent thereof for ten (10)&nbsp;years from and after the
date such pass is issued and 1-R or the equivalent thereof after such ten year
period. Executive shall be responsible for any personal income tax liability
arising from such pass travel. Notwithstanding the foregoing, all benefits
under this Section&nbsp;3 shall immediately and permanently cease in the event
Executive violates the Company&#146;s pass policies in connection with such travel
and/or in the event that Executive is or becomes, at any time thereafter, an
employee of any of the top five airlines in the United States (other than the
Company) ranked by revenue passenger miles.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Medical and Dental Benefits.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; While employed by the Company and thereafter
during the Executive&#146;s lifetime, Executive and his eligible dependents shall be
entitled to participate in the Company&#146;s medical and dental plans generally
applicable to all management employees of the Company under the same terms and
conditions as shall apply to such management employees; provided, however, that
if in the future Executive becomes employed by another employer, such coverage
shall become secondary to any coverage provided by such employer for the period
in which Executive is entitled to such coverage. In addition, while employed by
the Company hereunder, Executive shall be reimbursed by the Company for all
reasonable out of pocket medical and dental expenses incurred by Executive and
his eligible dependents and not otherwise paid or provided for under any
medical plan maintained for Executive&#146;s benefit.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Termination of Employment</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Upon Death.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive&#146;s employment hereunder shall
terminate upon his death.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">By the Company.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; The Company may terminate Executive&#146;s
employment hereunder at any time with or without Cause.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">By the Executive.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive may terminate his employment
hereunder at any time for any reason.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.4</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notice of Termination, Payments.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Any termination of Executive&#146;s
employment hereunder (other than by death) shall be communicated by thirty
(30)&nbsp;days&#146; advance written Notice of Termination by the terminating party
to the other party to this Agreement; <i>provided</i>
that no advance Notice of Termination of Executive for Cause by the Company is
required.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Payments in the Event of
Termination of Employment</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Payments in the Event of Termination by the Company for Cause or
Voluntary Termination by Executive.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; If Executive&#146;s employment hereunder is
terminated by the Company for Cause, as a result of death or Disability or by
Executive other than for Good Reason, the Company shall pay Executive
(a)&nbsp;his accrued and unpaid Base Salary through the Date of Termination and
(b)&nbsp;any vested or accrued and unpaid payments, rights or benefits
Executive may be otherwise entitled to receive pursuant to the </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">3</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">terms of any written retirement, pension or other employee benefit or
compensation plan maintained by the Company at the time or times provided
therein.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Payments in the Event of Any Other Termination of Employment.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; If
Executive&#146;s employment hereunder is terminated by the Company other than for
Cause, or by Executive for Good Reason:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The Company shall pay Executive (i)&nbsp;his
accrued and unpaid Base Salary through the Date of Termination, (ii)&nbsp;any
bonus under the Key Employee Cash Incentive Bonus Program, or any successor
annual bonus plan, (the &#147;<i>Incentive Bonus</i>&#148;)
for any calendar year ended before the Date of Termination, (iii)&nbsp;a pro
rata share (based on days employed during the applicable year) of the Incentive
Bonus Executive would otherwise have received with respect to the year in which
the Date of Termination occurs, payable at the time the Incentive Bonus would
otherwise be payable to Executive; <i>provided,
however,</i> that 100% of the Incentive Bonus shall be determined solely
with reference to the financial performance of the Company for the year (based
on the goals previously established with respect thereto) (rather than a
portion of the Incentive Bonus determined on the basis of individual
performance); <i>provided, further,</i>
in the event that Company&#146;s performance exceeds 100% of the financial
performance target for the year, that portion of the Incentive Bonus that would
have, but for this Section&nbsp;5.2(a), related to the achievement of the
individual performance target shall be 100% and (iv)&nbsp;any vested or accrued
and unpaid payments, rights or benefits Executive may be otherwise entitled to
receive pursuant to the terms of any written retirement, pension or other
employee benefit or compensation plan maintained by the Company at the time or
times provided therein.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In addition to the compensation and benefits
described in Section&nbsp;5.2(a):</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The Company shall pay Executive, no later than
thirty (30)&nbsp;days following Executive&#146;s termination of employment, a lump
sum amount equal to two (2)&nbsp;times the sum of (i)&nbsp;Executive&#146;s annual
Base Salary and (ii)&nbsp;the target Incentive Bonus for Executive with respect
to the year in which the Date of Termination occurs (or if no target has been
set for that year, the target Incentive Bonus for the immediately preceding
year).</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Until the earlier of the fourth anniversary of
Executive&#146;s Date of Termination or the date Executive is employed by a new
employer, Executive, his dependents, beneficiaries and estate shall be entitled
to all benefits under the Company&#146;s group life insurance as if Executive were
still employed by the Company hereunder during such period.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive shall not be required to mitigate the
amount of any payment provided for in this Section&nbsp;5.2 by seeking other
employment or otherwise, and no such payment shall be offset or reduced as a
result of Executive obtaining new employment.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notwithstanding anything else to the contrary in
this Agreement, the Company&#146;s obligation regarding the payments and other
benefits provided for in Sections 5.2(a)(iii)&nbsp;and 5.2(b)(i)&nbsp;and
(ii)&nbsp;is expressly conditioned upon the execution, delivery and
non-revocation of a general release in the form attached hereto as Attachment
A.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Board/Committee Resignation.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160; Executive&#146;s termination of employment for any
reason, shall constitute, as of the date of such termination and to the extent
applicable, a resignation as an officer of the Company and a resignation from
the Board (and any committees thereof) and the Board of Directors (and any
committees thereof) of any of the Company&#146;s affiliates and from the board of
directors or similar governing body of any corporation, limited liability
company or other entity in which the Company or any affiliate holds an equity
interest and with respect to which board or similar governing body Executive
serves as the Company&#146;s or such affiliate&#146;s designee or other representative.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Confidentiality; Non-Compete;
Non-Solicitation; Nondisparagement</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">While employed by the Company and thereafter, Executive
shall not disclose any Confidential Information either directly or indirectly,
to anyone (other than appropriate Company employees and advisors), or use such
information for his own account, or for the account of any other person or
entity, without the prior written consent of the Company or except as required
by law. This confidentiality covenant has no temporal or geographical
restriction. For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Confidential Information&#148; shall
mean all non-public information respecting the Company&#146;s business, including,
but not limited to, its services, pricing, scheduling, products, research and
development, processes, customer lists, marketing plans and strategies,
financing plans and the terms and provisions of this Agreement, but excluding
information that is, or becomes, available to the public (unless such
availability occurs through an unauthorized act on the part of the Executive).
Upon termination of this Agreement, Executive shall promptly supply to the
Company all property and any other tangible product or document that has been
produced by, received by or otherwise submitted to Executive during or prior to
his term of employment, and shall not retain any copies thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive acknowledges that his services are of special,
unique and extraordinary value to the Company. Accordingly, Executive shall not
at any time prior to the first anniversary of the Date of Termination
(i)&nbsp;become an employee, consultant, officer, partner or director of any
air carrier which competes with the Company (or any of its affiliates) or
(ii)&nbsp;whether on Executive&#146;s own behalf or on behalf of or in conjunction
with any person, company, business entity or other organization whatsoever,
directly or indirectly solicit or encourage any employee of the Company or its
affiliates to leave the employment of the Company or its affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">While employed by the Company and thereafter, Executive
agrees not to make any untruthful or disparaging statements, written or oral,
about the Company, its affiliates, their predecessors or successors or any of
their past and present officers, directors, stockholders, partners, members,
agents and employees or the Company&#146;s business practices, operations or
personnel policies and practices to any of the Company&#146;s customers, clients,
competitors, suppliers, investors, directors, consultants, employees, former
employees, or the press or other media in any country.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive agrees that any breach of the terms of this
Section&nbsp;6 would result in irreparable injury and damage for which there
would be no adequate remedy at law, and that, in the event of said breach or
any threat of breach, the Company shall be entitled to an immediate injunction
and restraining order to prevent such breach or threatened breach, without
having to prove damages, in addition to any other remedies to which the Company
may be entitled at law or in equity. Executive further agrees that the
provisions of the covenant not to compete are reasonable. Should a court
determine, however, that any provision of the covenant not to compete is
unreasonable, either in period of time, geographical area, or otherwise, the
parties hereto agree that the covenant should be interpreted and enforced to
the maximum extent which such court deems reasonable. The provisions of this
Section&nbsp;6 shall survive any termination of this Agreement and Executive&#146;s
term of employment. The existence of any claim or cause of action or otherwise,
shall not constitute a defense to the enforcement of the covenants and agreements
of this Section&nbsp;6.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Successors and Assigns</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Agreement shall bind any successor to the
Company, whether by purchase, merger, consolidation or otherwise, in the same
manner and to the same extent that the Company would be obligated under this
Agreement if no such succession had taken place.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Agreement shall not be assignable by
Executive. This Agreement and all rights of Executive hereunder shall inure to
the benefit of and be enforceable by, Executive&#146;s personal or legal representatives,
executors, administrators, successors, heirs, distributes, devises and
legatees.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">5</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Term</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The term of this Agreement shall commence on the
Effective Date and end upon the Executive&#146;s termination of employment. The
rights and obligations of the Company and Executive shall survive the
termination of this Agreement to the fullest extent necessary to give effect to
the terms hereof.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notices</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notices and all other communications provided for in this
Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given when
delivered to and mailed by United States mail, addressed:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">if to Executive, to the address set forth on the
signature page hereto, and</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">if to the Company, c/o Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., 2700 Lone Oak Parkway, Eagan, Minnesota 55121, Attention:
General Counsel,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">or, in each case, to such other address as may have been furnished in
writing.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Withholding</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">All payments required to be made by the Company hereunder
shall be subject to the withholding and/or deduction of such amounts as are
required to be withheld or deducted pursuant to any applicable law or
regulation. The Company shall have the right and is hereby authorized to
withhold or deduct from any compensation or other amount owing to Executive,
applicable withholding taxes and deductions and to take such action as may be
necessary in the opinion of the Company to satisfy all obligations for the
payment of such taxes or deductions.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Certain Defined Terms</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">As used herein, the following terms have the following
meanings:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Agreement</i>&#148;
shall mean this Management Compensation Agreement, as the same may be amended,
supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time in accordance herewith.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Base Salary</i>&#148;
shall mean the salary of the Executive in effect from time to time under
Section&nbsp;2.1.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Board</i>&#148;
shall mean the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Cause</i>&#148;
shall mean with respect to termination by the Company of Executive&#146;s employment
hereunder (i)&nbsp;an act or acts of dishonesty by Executive resulting in, or
intended to result in, directly or indirectly, any personal enrichment of
Executive, (ii)&nbsp;an act or acts of dishonesty by Executive intended to
cause substantial injury to the Company, (iii)&nbsp;material breach (other than
as a result of a Disability) by Executive of Executive&#146;s obligations under this
Agreement which action was (a)&nbsp;undertaken without a reasonable belief that
the action was in the best interests of the Company and (b)&nbsp;not remedied
within a reasonable period of time after receipt of written notice from the
Company specifying the alleged breach, (iv)&nbsp;Executive&#146;s conviction of, or
plea of nolo contendere to, a crime constituting (a)&nbsp;a felony under the
laws of any country, the United States or any state thereof or (b)&nbsp;a
misdemeanor involving moral turpitude or (v)&nbsp;a material breach of
(a)&nbsp;the Company&#146;s Code of Business Conduct or (b)&nbsp;the provisions of
this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Date of Termination</i>&#148;
shall mean, with respect to Executive, the date of termination of Executive&#146;s
employment hereunder after the notice period provided by Section&nbsp;4.4.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Disability</i>&#148;
shall mean Executive&#146;s physical or mental condition which prevents continued
performance of his duties hereunder, if Executive establishes by medical
evidence that such condition will be permanent and continuous during the
remainder of Executive&#146;s life or is likely to be of at least three
(3)&nbsp;years duration.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Effective Date</i>&#148;
shall mean January&nbsp;14, 2002.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">6</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Good Reason</i>&#148;
shall mean with respect to an Executive, any one or more of the following:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a material reduction in Executive&#146;s Base Salary or
level of target bonus under the KEACIP or any successor bonus plan (except as
permitted hereunder);</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">except as otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;1.2,
any substantial and sustained diminution in Executive&#146;s authority or
responsibilities hereunder;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">the relocation of the Company&#146;s principal
executive offices to a location outside the Minneapolis-St. Paul Metropolitan
Area;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a failure by the Company to comply with any
provision of this Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">provided, however,</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> that the foregoing events shall constitute Good
Reason only if the Company fails to cure such event within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days after receipt from Executive of written notice of the event
which constitutes Good Reason; <i>provided,
further,</i> that &#147;Good Reason&#148; shall cease to exist for an event on the
60</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;day
following the later of its occurrence or Executive&#146;s knowledge thereof, unless
Executive has given the Company written notice thereof prior to such date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In order for Executive&#146;s termination of his employment to
be considered for Good Reason, such termination must occur within one
(1)&nbsp;year after the event giving rise to such Good Reason. Executive&#146;s
continued employment shall not constitute consent to, or a waiver of rights
with respect to, any circumstance constituting Good Reason hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Notice of Termination</i>&#148;
shall mean a notice specifying the Date of Termination.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive Representation</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive hereby represents to the Company that the
execution and delivery of this Agreement by Executive and the Company and the
performance by Executive of Executive&#146;s duties hereunder shall not constitute a
breach of, or otherwise contravene, the terms of any employment agreement or
other agreement or policy to which Executive is a party or otherwise bound.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">13.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Amendment</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">No provision of this Agreement may be modified, waived or
discharged unless such waiver, modification or discharge is agreed to in
writing signed by Executive and an authorized officer of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">14.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Governing Law</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The validity, interpretation, construction and performance
of this Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Minnesota,
without regard to principles of conflicts of laws.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">15.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Validity</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision or
provisions of this Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of
any other provision of this Agreement which shall remain in full force and
effect.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">16.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Arbitration</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Except as otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;17 of this
Agreement, all disputes and controversies arising from or in conjunction with Executive&#146;s
employment with, or any termination from, the Company and all disputes and
controversies arising under or in connection with this Agreement (except claims
for vested benefits brought under ERISA) shall be settled by mandatory
arbitration conducted before one arbitrator having knowledge of employment law
in accordance with the rules for expedited resolution of employment disputes of
the American Arbitration Association then in effect. The arbitration shall be
held in the Minneapolis/St. Paul metropolitan area at a location selected by
the </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">7</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Company. The determination of the arbitrator shall be made within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days following the close of the hearing on any dispute or controversy
and shall be final and binding on the parties. The parties hereby waive their
right to a trial of any and all claims arising out of this Agreement or breach
of this Agreement. All costs and expenses incurred in connection with any
arbitration including, without limitation, arbitrator and attorney&#146;s fees,
shall be paid by the nonprevailing party in the arbitration unless the
arbitrator determines that such expenses must be otherwise allocated under
applicable law to maintain the validity of this Section&nbsp;16.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">17.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Specific Performance</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notwithstanding Section&nbsp;16 of this Agreement, if
Executive breaches or threatens to commit a breach of Section&nbsp;6 of this
Agreement, the Company shall have the right to specific performance (i.e., the
right and remedy to have the terms and conditions of Section&nbsp;6
specifically enforced by any court of competent jurisdiction), it being agreed
that any breach or threatened breach of Section&nbsp;6 would cause irreparable
injury and that money damages may not provide an adequate remedy.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">18.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Cooperation</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive shall provide his reasonable cooperation in
connection with any investigation, action or proceeding (or any appeal from any
action or proceeding) which relates to events occurring during Executive&#146;s
employment hereunder. This provision shall survive any termination of this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">19.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Compensation Limitation</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing, Executive and the Company
agree that (i)&nbsp;to the extent permitted by the Air Transportation Safety
and System Stabilization Act (the &#147;Act&#148;) any payments or benefits payable to
Executive under this Agreement (including, without limitation, payments under
Sections 2 and 5 hereof) or pursuant to any other compensation or benefit plan
of the Company or other arrangement between the Company and Executive that do
not comply with the Act shall be deferred until such payments or benefits may
be paid under the Act, and (ii)&nbsp;to the extent the Act does not permit the
deferral of any such payments or benefits, the maximum compensation and /or
severance Executive may receive from the Company under this Agreement or any
other compensation or benefit plan of the Company or other arrangement between
the Company and Executive will not exceed the amount allowed under the Act.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">20.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Entire Agreement</i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Agreement, together with the Release, any award
agreement between the Company and Executive entered into pursuant to the
Company&#146;s stock incentive plans, the Company&#146;s employee benefit plans in which
Executive will continue to participate as provided in this Agreement, and any
written arrangements in respect of travel on other airlines, contain the entire
understanding between the Company and Executive with respect to Executive&#146;s
employment with the Company and supersedes in all respects any prior or other
agreement or understanding between the Company or any affiliate of the Company
and Executive with respect to Executive&#146;s employment.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">8</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company and Executive have
executed this Agreement as of the day and year first above written.</font></p>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:4.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="54%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.7%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Richard H. Anderson <br>
  Chief Executive Officer</font></p>
