 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">9</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Attachment&nbsp;A</font></i></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">GENERAL RELEASE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS,&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (the &#147;Executive&#148;) has
been employed by Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Northwest&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive&#146;s employment with Northwest has
terminated; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive and Northwest have reached a full and
final compromise and settlement of all matters, disputes, causes of action,
claims, contentions and differences between them and Northwest&#146;s divisions,
merged entities and affiliates, subsidiaries, parents, branches, predecessors,
successors, assigns, officers, directors, trustees, employees, agents,
stockholders, administrators, representatives, attorneys, insurers or
fiduciaries, past, present or future (the &#147;Released Parties&#148;), including but
not limited to any and all claims arising from or derivative of Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest and his termination from employment with Northwest;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, in return for Northwest performing its
obligations as provided for herein and as set forth in the Management
Compensation Agreement dated as of&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; , 2001, by and between
Northwest and Executive (the &#147;Agreement&#148;), Executive will execute and comply
fully with the terms of this General Release (the &#147;Release&#148;);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Executive (i)&nbsp;understands that in executing
the Release he is, <i>inter alia</i>,
giving up rights and claims under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of
1967, as amended, 29 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;621 <i>et
seq.</i> (&#147;ADEA&#148;), and (ii)&nbsp;has been given a period of not less
than twenty-one (21)&nbsp;days within which to consider this Release;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing and for
other good and valuable consideration, Executive and Northwest agree and
covenant as follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">By
entering into this Release, the Released Parties do not admit, and each
specifically denies any liability, wrongdoing or violation of any law, statute,
regulations, agreement or policy.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest shall be terminated effective&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; ,&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; .</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In
consideration of the obligations of Executive as set forth in this Release and
the Agreement, and in full settlement and final satisfaction of any and all
claims, contractual or otherwise, which Executive had, has or may have against
Northwest and/or the Released Parties with respect to his employment,
termination from employment with Northwest, or otherwise arising on or prior to
the date of execution of this Release, Northwest shall pay to Executive the
payments and benefits to which Executive is entitled under the Agreement. This
Release shall not pertain to any claim alleging that Northwest has failed to
comply with any obligations created by this Release or that Northwest has
failed to pay to Executive the payments and benefits to which Executive is
entitled under the Agreement upon termination of Executive&#146;s employment.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive, for
and in consideration of the payments as set forth in the Agreement and for
other good and valuable consideration, hereby releases and forever discharges
and covenants not to sue, and by this Release does release and forever
discharge, the Released Parties of and from all debts, obligations, promises,
covenants, collective bargaining obligations, agreements, contracts,
endorsements, bonds, controversies, suits or causes of actions known or
unknown, suspected or unsuspected, of every kind and nature whatsoever, which
may heretofore have existed or which may now exist, including but not limited
to those arising under the ADEA, Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as
amended, 42 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2000e, <i>et
seq.</i>, Executive Order 11246, 30 Fed. Reg. 12319; the Employee
Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;1001, <i>et seq.</i>, the
Americans With Disabilities Act, as amended, 42 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;12101, <i>et seq.</i>, the Federal Equal Pay Act, 29
U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2061, <i>et seq.</i>,
the Reconstruction Era Civil Rights Act, as amended, 42 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;1981, <i>et </i></font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">10</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">seq.</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended, 29 U.S.C.
Section&nbsp;701, <i>et seq.</i>, the
Family and Medical Leave Act of 1992, 29 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;2601, <i>et seq.</i>, the Minnesota Human Rights Act,
Minn. Stat. Section&nbsp;363.01, <i>et seq.</i>,
and any all state or local constitutions and/or laws regarding employment
discrimination and/or federal, state or local constitutions and/or laws of any
type or description regarding employment as well as any claim for breach of
contract, wrongful discharge, breach of any express or implied promise,
misrepresentation, fraud, whistleblowing, retaliation, violation of public
policy, infliction of emotional distress, defamation, promissory estoppel,
invasion of privacy or any other theory or claim, whether legal or equitable,
including but not limited to any claims arising from or derivative of Executive&#146;s
employment with Northwest and Executive&#146;s termination of employment with
Northwest or otherwise. Executive acknowledges that he has not been
discriminated against on the basis of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity,
religion or any other protected class status.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Without in any way limiting the foregoing, this
Release shall not affect any present or future indemnification obligations that
Northwest and the Released Parties may have to Executive pursuant to any
charter, by-law, agreement or policy of insurance.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Release shall not affect Executive&#146;s rights
under one or more Non-Qualified Stock Option Agreements, Deferred Stock Award
Agreement or Phantom Stock Unit Award Agreement between Northwest and the
Executive governing the terms of any stock option grant or other stock award
outstanding on the date hereof, which rights shall continue to be governed by
the terms of the agreement applicable to such stock option or other stock
award.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive
covenants and agrees not to sue nor authorize any other party, either
governmental or otherwise, to file any grievances, arbitration or commence any
other proceeding, administrative or judicial, against the Released Parties in
any court of law or equity, or before any administrative agency, with respect
to any matter relating to this Agreement or to matters occurring during
Executive&#146;s employment with Northwest.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The
Released Parties and Executive understand and agree that the terms of this
Release and the Agreement are confidential.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive
agrees not to make any untruthful or disparaging statements, written or oral,
about Northwest, the Released Parties or Northwest&#146;s personnel policies and
practices to any of Northwest&#146;s customers, competitors, suppliers, employees,
former employees, or the press or other media. Except as herein contemplated,
Executive also agrees that he will not voluntarily participate in any
proceeding of any kind brought against the Released Parties relating to this
Agreement or to matters occurring during Executive&#146;s employment with Northwest.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The parties agree
that this Release should be construed in accordance with the laws of the State
of Minnesota, exclusive of Minnesota choice of law provisions.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The parties agree that any and all further legal
proceedings between Executive and the Released Parties, whether arising under
statute, constitutions, contract, common law or otherwise, including the issue
of arbitrability, will be submitted for resolution exclusively pursuant to the
arbitration provision contained in the Agreement. The parties hereby waive
their right to a trial of any and all claims arising out of this Release or
breach of this Release.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Should any provision of this Release be found to
be in violation of any law, or ineffective or barred for any reason whatsoever,
the remainder of this Release shall be in full force and effect to the maximum
extent permitted by law.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Northwest
and Executive agree to execute such other documents to take such other actions
as may be reasonably necessary to further the purposes of this Release.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive acknowledges and agrees that, in
deciding to execute this Release, he has had the opportunity to consult with
legal, financial and other personal advisors of his own choosing as he </font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">11</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\Fc\74131929273_P66484_1869189\5449-1-ku-03.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:19 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">deems appropriate, in assessing whether to execute this
Release. Executive represents and acknowledges that no representations,
statement, promise, inducement, threat or suggestion has been made by Northwest
or the Released Parties to influence him to sign this Release except such
statements as are expressly set forth herein. Executive agrees that he has been
given a minimum of twenty-one (21)&nbsp;days within which to consider the terms
and effects of this Release insofar as it relates to settlement and release of
potential claims under the ADEA, and to consult with, and to ask any questions
that he may have of anyone, including legal counsel and other personal advisors
of his own choosing, and that he has executed this Release voluntarily and with
full understanding of its terms and effects.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Executive has the right to rescind this Release as
far as it extends to potential claims under Minn. Stat. Ch. 363 (prohibiting
discrimination in employment) by written notice to the Company within 15
calendars days following the execution of this Release. Executive also has the
right to revoke this Release as far as it extends to potential claims under the
Age Discrimination in Employment Act, 29 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;621 <i>et seq.</i>, by informing the Company of his
intent to revoke this Release within seven calendar days following the
execution of this Release. To be effective, notice, rescission or revocation
must be in writing and must be delivered either by hand or by mail to Douglas
M. Steenland, Executive Vice President&nbsp;&amp; Chief Corporate Officer of
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., Department A1180, 5101 Northwest Drive, St.
Paul, Minnesota, 55111-3034, within the specified period. If a notice of
rescission or revocation is delivered by mail, it must be: (i)&nbsp;postmarked
within the 15 or 7&nbsp;day period, respectively, (ii)&nbsp;properly addressed
to Mr.&nbsp;Steenland as set forth above, and (iii)&nbsp;sent by certified mail
return receipt requested. This Release shall not become effective or
enforceable until the 15 or 7&nbsp;day periods described above have expired. No
payments shall be due, owing or paid by Northwest unless and until this Release
becomes effective.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This Release may not be changed or modified, except by a
written instrument signed by Executive and Northwest.</font></p>

  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">

  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">

  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:7.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:74.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Limitations Periods</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:7.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.5.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:74.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhaustion of Administrative Remedies</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:7.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:74.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 9. </font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="81%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:81.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONSTRUCTION</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">

  </td>
  <td width="81%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:81.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:7.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:74.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Defined Terms</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:74.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ERISA Status</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="13%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:13.42%;">

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">ii</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='ii',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kv-03.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 11:09 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST AIRLINES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">EXCESS PENSION PLAN FOR SALARIED EMPLOYEES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(2001
Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.1<b>&#160; Amendment and Restatement</b>.&#160; On July&nbsp;3, 1985 but effective as of
January&nbsp;1, 1985, Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation,
(hereinafter the &#147;Principal Sponsor&#148;) heretofore established the &#147;Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Excess Benefit Plan&#148; and reserved to itself the right to
amend that Plan from time to time. Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 1989, the
Principal Sponsor amended and restated that earlier document by the adoption of
the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Officers Excess Benefit Plan&#148; and effective
as of January&nbsp;1, 1994, the Principal Sponsor again amended and restated
that document by the adoption of the &#147;Northwest Airlines Excess Pension Plan
for Salaried Employees (1994 Restatement).&#148; By adoption of this amended and
restated document entitled &#147;Northwest Airlines Excess Pension Plan for Salaried
Employees (2001 Restatement),&#148; the Principal Sponsor hereby amends and restates
the Excess Plan in its entirety as applied to all persons who are Participants
as of January&nbsp;1, 2001 (without regard to whether they are then actively
employed on that date) and all persons who become Participants after that date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.2<b>&#160; Unfunded Obligation</b>.&#160; The obligation of the Principal Sponsor to
make payments under this Excess Plan constitutes only the unsecured (but
legally enforceable) promise of the Principal Sponsor to make such payments.
The Participant shall have no lien, prior claim or other security interest in
any property of the Principal Sponsor. If a fund is established by the
Principal Sponsor in connection with this Excess Plan, the property therein
shall remain the sole and exclusive property of the Principal Sponsor. The
Principal Sponsor will pay the cost of this Excess Plan out of its general
assets.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PLAN NAME</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This employee pension benefit plan shall be referred to
as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Excess Pension Plan for Salaried Employees&#148; (the &#147;Excess
Plan&#148;). This document, as distinguished from the plan maintained pursuant to
this document, shall be referred to as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Excess Pension
Plan for Salaried Employees (2001 Restatement).&#148;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 3</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PARTICIPANTS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.1<b>&#160; Scope</b>.&#160; Unless the context clearly requires
otherwise, the provisions of this amended and restated document shall not
affect the entitlement to or amount of benefit payable to or with respect to
any Participant, employee or other individual who shall have retired or
terminated employment from the Principal Sponsor prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001,
unless that Participant returns to active Recognized Employment after
January&nbsp;1, 2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2<b>&#160; General Participation Rule.</b>&#160; The individuals eligible to participate in
and receive benefits under this Excess Plan are those employees of Principal
Sponsor and other affiliated companies who are, on or after January&nbsp;1,
1985, participants in the Qualified Pension Plan and who are, at some time on
or after January&nbsp;1, 1985, actively employed by the Principal Sponsor or
such other affiliated companies. Any employee who has become a Participant in
the Excess Plan shall continue as a Participant until all benefits which are
due under this Excess Plan have been received without regard to whether he or
she continues as a participant in the Qualified Pension Plan or an active
employee. Notwithstanding anything apparently to the contrary contained in this
Excess Plan, the Excess Plan shall be construed and administered to prevent the
duplication of benefits provided under this Excess</font></p>


<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\fc\7444838291_H10827_1869830\5449-1-kv-05.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 04:48 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 4.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Plan
and any other qualified or nonqualified plan maintained in whole or in part by
the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 3.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.3<b>&#160; Overriding Exclusion.</b>&#160; Notwithstanding anything apparently to the
contrary in this Excess Plan or in any written communication, summary,
resolution or document or oral communication, no individual shall be a
Participant in this Excess Plan, develop benefits under this Excess Plan or be
entitled to receive benefits under this Excess Plan (either for himself or his
or her survivors) unless such individual is a member of a select group of
management or highly compensated employees (as that expression is used in
ERISA). If a court of competent jurisdiction, any representative of the U.S.
Department of Labor or any other governmental, regulatory or similar body makes
any direct or indirect, formal or informal, determination that an individual is
not a member of a select group of management or highly compensated employees
(as that expression is used in ERISA), such individual shall not be (and shall
not have ever been) a Participant in this Excess Plan at any time. If any
person not so defined has been erroneously treated as a Participant in this
Excess Plan, upon discovery of such error such person&#146;s erroneous participation
shall immediately terminate <i>ab initio</i>
and upon demand such person shall be obligated to reimburse the Principal
Sponsor for all amounts erroneously paid to him or her.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 5.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 4</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 5.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">BENEFITS PAYABLE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 5.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1<b>&#160; Benefit for Participants</b>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 5.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.1<i>&#160; </i><b>Entitlement and Amount.</b>&#160; Upon the Termination of Employment of a
Participant who has any Vested and nonforfeitable entitlement to an Accrued
Benefit under the Qualified Pension Plan, this Excess Plan shall pay to a
Participant the excess, if any, of the greater of the amount determined
pursuant to (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;below subject to the special rules in
(c)&nbsp;below. Participants who were not employed in Recognized Employment
prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001 do not have any benefit under the Excess Plan FAE
formula calculation in (a)&nbsp;below and, therefore, shall have their benefits
calculated exclusively pursuant to (b)&nbsp;below. Participants who were not
employed in Recognized Employment after December&nbsp;31, 2000 do not have any
benefit under the Excess Plan cash balance formula calculation in
(b)&nbsp;below and, therefore, shall have their benefits calculated exclusively
pursuant to (a)&nbsp;below.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="322" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:241.2pt;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading --><b>(a) Excess Plan FAE Formula Calculation.</b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt -.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="335" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:251.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b) Excess Plan CB Formula Calculation.</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="322" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:241.2pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1) <b>As If FAE
  Benefit.</b> Compute the benefit, if any, that would have been payable
  to the Participant as the FAE Formula Benefit specified in the Qualified
  Pension Plan (e.g., Single Life Benefit commencing at Normal Retirement Date)
  if the following special rules had been applied:</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) Disregard the benefit limitations under section
  415 of the Code, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii) Disregard the compensation limitation of
  section 401(a)(17) of the Code, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt -.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="335" rowspan="4" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:251.5pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1) <b>As If CB
  Benefit.</b> Compute
  the Cash Balance Account, if any, that would have been accumulated for the
  Participant under the Qualified Pension Plan if the following special rules
  had been applied:</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) Disregard the benefit limitations under section
  415 of the Code, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii) Disregard the compensation limitation of
  section 401(a)(17) of the Code, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii) Include in Earnings and Final Average Earnings
  amounts not otherwise included because they were deferred at the election of
  the Participant under a nonqualified deferred compensation plan at the time
  or times when they would have been included but for such election to defer,
  and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv) Recognize, for the purpose of determining the
  Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage, initial account balance and
  bonus factor in connection with the CB Formula Benefit, Benefit Service or
  Vesting Service or both that are required to be recognized for such purposes
  under this Excess Plan pursuant to a separate written agreement between the
  Principal Sponsor and the Participant (excluding, however, any Benefit
  Service awarded under the terms of the Northwest Airlines Supplemental
  Executive Retirement Plan or any ancillary agreement issued solely in connection
  with the SERP), and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v) Include in Earnings and in Final Average
  Earnings amounts that are required to be included for purposes of this Excess
  Plan pursuant to a separate written agreement between the Principal Sponsor
  and the Participant (excluding, however, any Earnings and Final Average
  Earnings awarded under the terms of the Northwest Airlines, Inc. Supplemental
  Executive Retirement Plan or any ancillary agreement issued solely in
  connection with that SERP).</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="322" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:241.2pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii) Include in Earnings and Final Average Earnings
  amounts not otherwise included because they were deferred at the election of
  the Participant under a nonqualified deferred compensation plan at the time
  or times when they would have been included but for such election to defer,
  and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt -.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="322" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:241.2pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv) Recognize as Benefit Service or Vesting Service
  or both periods that are required to be recognized for purposes of this
  Excess Plan pursuant to a separate written agreement between the Principal
  Sponsor and the Participant (excluding, however, any Benefit Service awarded
  under the terms of the Northwest Airlines, Inc. Supplemental Executive
  Retirement Plan or any ancillary agreement issued solely in connection with
  the SERP), and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:7.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt -.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="322" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:241.2pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v) Include in Earnings and in Final Average
  Earnings amounts that are required to be included for purposes of this Excess
  Plan pursuant to a separate written agreement between the Principal Sponsor
  and the Participant (excluding, however, any Earnings or Final Average
  Earnings awarded under the terms of the Northwest Airlines, Inc. Supplemental
  Executive Retirement Plan or any ancillary agreement issued solely in
  connection with that SERP).</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt -.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

  amount determined in (2) above and the resulting amount shall be the benefit
  payable to the Participant under this Excess Plan (unless the amount
  determined in Section 4.1.1(a)(5) is greater).</font></p>
