<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='ii',FILE='C:\Fc\7412421925_P66483CHE_1868393\5449-1-kw-06.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 12:42 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST AIRLINES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(2001
Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Part&nbsp;A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.1.<b>&#160; Plan Established.</b>&#160; Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 1995,
NORTHWEST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Principal Sponsor&#148;)
establishes this employee benefit plan for the purpose of providing additional
retirement to certain eligible employees in addition to the &#147;final average
earnings formula&#148; benefits provided under the tax-qualified defined benefit
pension plan known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Pension Plan for Salaried
Employees&#148; (the &#147;Pension Plan&#148;) and the nonqualified defined benefit pension
plan known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Pension Excess Plan for Salaried
Employees&#148; (the &#147;Excess Plan&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.2.<b>&#160; Scope of Part&nbsp;A.</b>&#160; This Part&nbsp;A of the SERP document
(together with the Preamble to the SERP document) contains all the provisions
and rules applicable to the following Participants:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; Each Participant with an effective date for the commencement of
SERP participation that is prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001, who did not continue
in active employment with Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. on or after
January&nbsp;1, 2001, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; Each Participant with an effective date for the commencement of
SERP participation that is prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001, who did continue in
active employment with Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. on or after
January&nbsp;1, 2001, but who did not affirmatively agree in an Ancillary
Agreement signed after January&nbsp;1, 2001 by the Participant and by the
Principal Sponsor to become covered under Part&nbsp;B.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">No portion of this Part&nbsp;A of the SERP document is applicable to any
Participant to whom Part&nbsp;B is applicable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.3.<b>&#160; Unfunded Obligation.</b>&#160; The obligation of the Principal Sponsor to
make payments under this SERP constitutes only the unsecured (but legally
enforceable) promise of the Principal Sponsor to make such payments. The
Participant shall have no lien, prior claim or other security interest in any
property of the Principal Sponsor. If a fund is established by the Principal
Sponsor in connection with this SERP, the property therein shall remain the
sole and exclusive property of the Principal Sponsor. The Principal Sponsor
will pay the cost of this SERP out of its general assets.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PLAN NAME</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This employee benefit plan shall be referred to as the &#147;Northwest
Airlines Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan&#148; (the &#147;SERP&#148;) and this portion
of the SERP shall be referred to as Part&nbsp;A. This document, as
distinguished from the plan maintained pursuant to this document, shall be
referred to as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(2001 Restatement)&#148; (the &#147;SERP document&#148;) and this portion of the 2001
Restatement shall be referred to as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#151;Part A&#148; (&#147;Part&nbsp;A of the SERP
document&#148;).</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 3</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PARTICIPANTS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.1.<b>&#160; Participants.</b>&#160; The Participants in the SERP shall be those
individuals who have been expressly designated as Participants by the Principal
Sponsor in writing. The effective date for the commencement of SERP participation
for each such individual shall be the date specified in such writing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.<b>&#160; Continuation of Status.</b>&#160; Any individual who has become a Participant
in the SERP shall continue as a Participant until all benefits which are due
under this SERP have been received without regard to whether he or she
continues as an officer or a participant in the Pension Plan or an active
employee.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 4</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">BENEFITS PAYABLE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.<b>&#160; Benefit for Participants</b>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.1.<i>&#160; </i><b>Entitlement and Amount.</b>&#160; Upon the retirement or other termination of
employment of a Participant who has any vested and nonforfeitable entitlement
to an Accrued Benefit under the Pension Plan, this SERP shall pay to a
Participant the excess, if any, of:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; the amount that would have been payable to the Participant under
the Pension Plan if such benefit had been determined:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; without regard to the benefit limitations under section&nbsp;415
of the Code, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; without regard to the compensation limitation of
section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Code, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iii)&#160; assuming that the Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service was
increased by two (2)&nbsp;additional deemed years of Benefit Service for each
actual year of employment completed by the Participant on or after the
Participant&#146;s effective date for the commencement of SERP participation (not to
exceed ten additional deemed years over and above the actual Benefit Service),
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iv)&#160; computing the Participant&#146;s Earnings and Final Average Earnings on
the basis of thirty-six (36)&nbsp;months rather than sixty (60)&nbsp;months and
without regard to whether those thirty-six (36)&nbsp;months are consecutive,
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(v)&#160;&#160; by including in Earnings and in Final Average Earnings amounts not
otherwise included because they were deferred at the election of the
Participant under a nonqualified deferred compensation plan at the time or
times when they would have been included but for such election to defer; minus</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; the amount actually paid from the Pension Plan and the Excess
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">The definitions of Earnings and Final Average Earnings are, except as
specifically provided herein, contained in the Pension Plan. For this purpose
and for similar purposes in Section&nbsp;4.2, notwithstanding anything to the
contrary in the definition of Earnings and Final Average Earnings in the
Pension Plan: (a)&nbsp;bonuses paid pursuant to the Principal Sponsor&#146;s annual
bonus program shall be spread evenly over the months in the calendar year in
which such bonuses were earned, (b)&nbsp;other bonuses (such as &#147;sign on
bonuses&#148;) shall be spread evenly over the twelve (12)&nbsp;months in the
calendar year in which such bonuses are paid, (c)&nbsp;income attributable in
any manner to stock options is not included in Earnings either when paid or
received, (d)&nbsp;severance payments, however denominated, are not included in
Earnings, and (e)&nbsp;any gross up payments shall be excluded from Earnings if
they relate to items that are themselves excluded from Earnings (such as
relocation payments).</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.2.<i>&#160; </i><b>Form of Payment.</b>&#160; Except as may otherwise be specifically
provided in this SERP, this benefit (minus the withholding, payroll and other
taxes which must be deducted therefrom) shall be paid to the Participant in the
same manner, at the same time, for the same duration and in the same form as if
such benefit had been paid directly from the Pension Plan. All elections and
optional forms of settlement in effect and all other rules governing the
payment of benefits under the Pension Plan shall, to the extent practicable, be
given effect under this SERP so that the Participant will receive from a
combination of the Pension Plan, the Excess Plan and this SERP the same benefit
(minus the withholding, payroll and other taxes which must be deducted
therefrom) which would have been received under the Pension Plan if the Excess
Plan and SERP benefit had been payable from the Pension Plan. Notwithstanding
the foregoing, the benefit payable from this SERP shall not commence until:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; at or after the Participant attains age sixty (60)&nbsp;years, or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; at or after the Participant attains age fifty-five
(55)&nbsp;years, but only if the retirement or other termination of employment
was:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; by action of the Principal Sponsor other than for Cause (as
defined in Section&nbsp;9), or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; for Good Reason (as defined in Section&nbsp;9), or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iii)&#160; at the request of or with the prior consent of the Principal
Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Pension Plan and the Excess Plan
regarding the reduction of benefits for early commencement, if the first
payment of the benefit payable under this SERP precedes the last day of the
month following the month in which the Participant would attain age sixty-five
(65)&nbsp;years, the amount otherwise payable under this SERP shall be reduced
five-twelfths of one percent (5/12%) for each full month by which such first
payment precedes the last day of the calendar month following the month in which
the Participant would attain age sixty-five (65)&nbsp;years. (Payments made
under the Pension Plan and the Excess Plan shall be reduced for early
commencement in accordance with the rules in the Pension Plan and the Excess
Plan.)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.<b>&#160; Benefit for Beneficiaries</b>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.1.<i>&#160; </i><b>Entitlement and Amount.</b>&#160; Upon the death of a Participant, this SERP
shall pay to the surviving spouse or other joint or contingent annuitant or
beneficiary of a Participant the excess, if any, of:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; the amount which would have been payable to such person under the
Pension Plan if such benefit had been determined:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; without regard to the benefit limitations under section&nbsp;415
of the Code, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; without regard to the compensation limitation of
section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Code, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iii)&#160; assuming that the Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service was
increased by two (2)&nbsp;additional deemed years of Benefit Service for each
actual year of employment completed by the Participant on or after the
Participant&#146;s effective date for the commencement of SERP participation (not to
exceed ten additional deemed years over and above the actual Benefit Service),
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iv)&#160; computing the Participant&#146;s Earnings and Final Average Earnings on
the basis of thirty-six (36)&nbsp;months rather than sixty (60)&nbsp;months and
without regard to whether those thirty-six (36)&nbsp;months are consecutive,
and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(v)&#160;&#160; by including in Earnings and in Final Average Earnings amounts not
otherwise included because they were deferred at the election of the
Participant under a</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">3</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">nonqualified deferred compensation
plan at the time or times when they would have been included but for such
election to defer; minus</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; the amount actually paid from the Pension Plan and the Excess
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.2.<i>&#160; </i><b>Form of Payment.</b>&#160; This benefit (minus the withholding, payroll
and other taxes which must be deducted therefrom) shall be paid to such person
in the same manner, at the same time, for the same duration and in the same
form as if such benefit had been paid directly from the Pension Plan. All
elections and optional forms of settlement in effect and all other rules
governing the payment of benefits under the Pension Plan shall, to the extent
practicable, be given effect under this SERP so that such person will receive
from a combination of the Pension Plan, the Excess Plan and this SERP the same
benefit (minus the withholding, payroll and other taxes which must be deducted
therefrom) which would have been received under the Pension Plan if the Excess
Plan and SERP benefit had been paid from the Pension Plan. To the extent relevant
to the determination of the amount of benefit payable to a surviving souse or
other joint or contingent annuitant under this SERP, early commencement
reduction factors consistent with those applicable to payments to a Participant
under Section&nbsp;4.1 shall also be applied to the benefit payable to any
survivor under this Section&nbsp;4.2.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.3.<b>&#160; Ancillary Agreements.</b>&#160; A Participant and the Principal Sponsor may,
from time to time, enter into other written agreements which vary the
entitlement to, computation of and form of benefits under this SERP including,
but not limited to, agreements requiring that this SERP recognize additional
periods of Benefit Service or Vesting Service or both and that this SERP
recognize additional Earnings and Final Average Earnings. With respect to any
such Participant, such written agreement shall be given effect under this SERP
as if fully set forth herein.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 5</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">FUNDING</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.1.<b>&#160; Hedging Investments.</b>&#160; If the Principal Sponsor elects to finance
all or a portion of its costs in connection with this SERP through the purchase
of life insurance or other investments, the Participant agrees, as a condition
of participation in this SERP, to cooperate with the Principal Sponsor in the
purchase of such investment to any extent reasonably required by the Principal
Sponsor and relinquishes any claim he or she may have either for himself or
herself or any beneficiary to the proceeds of any such investment or any other
rights or interests in such investment. If a Participant fails or refuses to cooperate,
then notwithstanding any other provision of this SERP (including, without
limiting the generality of the foregoing, Section&nbsp;4) the Principal Sponsor
shall immediately and irrevocably terminate and forfeit the Participant&#146;s
entitlement to benefits under the SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.2.<b>&#160; Corporate Obligation.</b>&#160; Neither the Principal Sponsor&#146;s officers nor
any member of its Board of Directors in any way secures or guarantees the
payment of any benefit or amount which may become due and payable hereunder to
or with respect to any Participant. Each Participant and other person entitled
at any time to payments hereunder shall look solely to the assets of the
Principal Sponsor for such payments as an unsecured, general creditor. After
benefits shall have been paid to or with respect to a Participant and such
payment purports to cover in full the benefit hereunder, such former
Participant or other person or persons, as the case may be, shall have no
further right or interest in the other assets of the Principal Sponsor in connection
with this SERP. Neither the Principal Sponsor nor any of its officers nor any
member of its Boards of Directors shall be under any liability or
responsibility for failure to effect any of the objectives or purposes of the
SERP by reason of the insolvency of the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 6</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">GENERAL MATTERS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.1.<b>&#160; Amendments.</b>&#160; This SERP may be amended by action of the
Principal Sponsor without the consent of any Participant in whole or in part,
from time to time and at any time; <b>provided,
however</b>, that no amendment of this SERP shall be effective as to a
Participant to the extent the amendment would have the effect of diminishing
the benefits payable to or with respect to the Participant under this SERP or
the procedural rights of the Participant under this SERP unless the Participant
has consented to such amendment in writing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.2.<b>&#160; ERISA Administrator.</b>&#160; The Principal Sponsor shall be the plan
administrator of this SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.3.<b>&#160; Service of Process.</b>&#160; In the absence of any designation to the
contrary by the Principal Sponsor, the Secretary of the Principal Sponsor is
designated as the appropriate and exclusive agent for the receipt of service of
process directed to the Plan in any legal proceeding, including arbitration,
involving the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.4.<b>&#160; Limited Benefits.</b>&#160; This SERP shall not provide any benefits
determined with respect to any defined contribution plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.5.<b>&#160; Spendthrift Provision.</b>&#160; No Participant, surviving spouse, joint or
contingent annuitant or beneficiary shall have the power to transmit, assign,
alienate, dispose of, pledge or encumber any benefit payable under this SERP
before its actual payment to such person. The Principal Sponsor shall not
recognize any such effort to convey any interest under this SERP. No benefit
payable under this SERP shall be subject to attachment, garnishment, execution
following judgment or other legal process before actual payment to such person.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.6.<b>&#160; Certifications.</b>&#160; Information to be supplied or written notices
to be made or consents to be given by the Principal Sponsor pursuant to any
provision of this SERP may be signed in the name of the Principal Sponsor by
any officer who has been authorized to make such certification or to give such
notices or consents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.7.<b>&#160; Errors in Computations.</b>&#160; The Principal Sponsor shall not be liable or
responsible for any error in the computation of any benefit payable to or with
respect to any Participant resulting from any misstatement of fact made by the
Participant or by or on behalf of any survivor to whom such benefit shall be payable,
directly or indirectly, to the Principal Sponsor, and used by the Principal
Sponsor in determining the benefit. The Principal Sponsor shall not be
obligated or required to increase the benefit payable to or with respect to
such Participant which, on discovery of the misstatement, is found to be
understated as a result of such misstatement of the Participant. However, the
benefit of any Participant which is overstated by reason of any such
misstatement or any other reason shall be reduced to the amount appropriate in
view of the truth (and to recover any prior overpayment).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 7</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">FORFEITURE OF
BENEFITS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">All benefits under this SERP, shall be permanently
forfeited if the Participant becomes at any time an employee of any of the top
five (5)&nbsp;passenger airlines in the Unites States (other than the Principal
Sponsor) as ranked by revenue passenger miles. In no event shall this Section
serve as a basis for requiring a Participant to repay any benefits previously
paid to a Participant prior to commencement of such employment.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">5</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 8</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CLAIMS PROCEDURE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.1.<b>&#160; Initiating Benefits.</b>&#160; At the earliest time that a Participant may
be entitled to receive benefits under this SERP, the Principal Sponsor shall
notify the Participant of that entitlement and of the procedures for requesting
the payment of benefits hereunder. Without regard to whether such notification
is given by the Principal Sponsor, a Participant may request the payment of
benefits under this SERP. The Principal Sponsor shall, upon receipt of such request
expeditiously process the payment of benefits hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.2.<b>&#160; Original Claim.</b>&#160; Any person may file with the Principal
Sponsor a written claim for benefits under the SERP. Within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days after the filing of such a claim, the Principal Sponsor shall
notify the claimant in writing whether his or her claim is upheld or denied in
whole or in part or shall furnish the claimant a written notice describing
specific special circumstances requiring a specified amount of additional time
(but not more than sixty days from the date the claim was filed) to reach a
decision on the claim. If the claim is denied in whole or in part, the
Principal Sponsor shall state in writing:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; the specific reasons for the denial;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; the specific references to the pertinent provisions of this SERP
on which the denial is based;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; a description of any additional material or information necessary
for the claimant to perfect the claim and an explanation of why such material
or information is necessary; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; an explanation of the claims review procedure set forth in this
section.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.3.<b>&#160; Claims Review Procedure.</b>&#160; Within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt of
notice that his or her claim has been denied in whole or in part, the claimant
may file with the Principal Sponsor a written request for a review and may, in
conjunction therewith, submit written issues and comments. Within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days after the filing of such a request for review, the Principal
Sponsor shall notify the claimant in writing whether, upon review, the claim was
upheld or denied in whole or in part or shall furnish the claimant a written
notice describing specific special circumstances requiring a specified amount
of additional time (but not more than sixty days from the date the request for
review was filed) to reach a decision on the request for review.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.4.<b>&#160; General Rules</b>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; No inquiry or question shall be deemed to be a claim or a request
for a review of a denied claim unless made in accordance with the claims
procedure. The Principal Sponsor may require that any claim for benefits and
any request for a review of a denied claim be filed on forms to be furnished by
the Principal Sponsor upon request.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; All decisions on claims and on requests for a review of denied
claims shall be made by the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; The Principal Sponsor may, in its discretion, hold one or more
hearings on a claim or a request for a review of a denied claim.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; Claimants may be represented by a lawyer or other representative
(at their own expense). A claimant&#146;s representative shall be entitled to
receive copies of notices sent to the claimant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(e)&#160;&#160; The decision of the Principal Sponsor on a claim and on a request
for a review of a denied claim shall be served on the claimant in writing. If a
decision or notice is not received by a claimant within the time specified, the
claim or request for a review of a denied claim shall be deemed to have been
denied.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">6</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160; Prior to filing a claim or a request for a review of a denied
claim, the claimant or his or her representative shall have a reasonable
opportunity to review a copy of this SERP and all other pertinent documents in
the possession of the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(g)&#160;&#160; The Principal Sponsor may permanently or temporarily delegate all
or a portion of its authority and responsibility under this Section&nbsp;8 to a
committee or individual.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(h)&#160;&#160; The procedures and remedies herein are not exclusive. A
Participant shall not be required to exhaust these administrative remedies. If
there is litigation regarding the benefits payable to or with respect to a
Participant, determinations by the Principal Sponsor shall not be afforded any
deference and the matter shall be heard <i>de
novo</i>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 9</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSTRUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.1.<b>&#160; Defined Terms.</b>&#160; Words and phrases used in this SERP document
with initial capital letters, which are defined in the Pension Plan documents
and which are not separately defined in this SERP document shall have the same
meaning ascribed to them in the Pension Plan documents unless in the context in
which they are used it would be clearly inappropriate to do so. For the
purposes of this SERP, the terms &#147;Change in Control,&#148; &#147;Cause&#148; and &#147;Good Reason&#148;
shall have the meanings specified in the Appendix&nbsp;A to this SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.2.<b>&#160; ERISA Status.</b>&#160; This SERP is adopted with the understanding
that it is an unfunded plan maintained primarily for the purpose of providing
deferred compensation for a select group of management or highly compensated
employees as provided in section&nbsp;201(2), section&nbsp;301(3) and
section&nbsp;401(a)(1) of ERISA. Each provision shall be interpreted and
administered accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.3.<b>&#160; IRC Status.</b>&#160; This SERP is intended to be a nonqualified
deferred compensation arrangement. The rules of section&nbsp;401(a) <i>et. seq.</i> of the Code shall not apply to
this SERP. The rules of section&nbsp;3121(v)&nbsp;and section&nbsp;3306(r)(2)
of the Code shall apply to this SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.4.<b>&#160; Effect on Other Plans.</b>&#160; This SERP shall not alter, enlarge or
diminish any person&#146;s employment rights or obligations or rights or obligations
under the Pension Plan, the Excess Plan or any other plan. It is specifically
contemplated that the Pension Plan and Excess Plan could, from time to time, be
amended and possibly terminated. This SERP shall not preclude any such
amendments or terminations. Although the Principal Sponsor is generally free to
amend and terminate the Pension Plan and the Excess Plan, no amendment or
termination of the Pension Plan or the Excess Plan shall be effective as to a
Participant to the extent the amendment or termination would have the effect of
diminishing the benefits payable to or with respect to the Participant (or the
procedural rights of the Participant) under this SERP unless the Participant
has affirmatively agreed in writing to such amendment or termination.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.5.<b>&#160; Disqualification.</b>&#160; Notwithstanding any other provision of this SERP
document or any election or designation made under the SERP, any individual who
feloniously and intentionally kills a Participant shall be deemed for all
purposes of this SERP and all elections and designations made under this SERP
to have died before such Participant. A final judgment of conviction of
felonious and intentional killing is conclusive for this purpose. In the
absence of a conviction of felonious and intentional killing, the Principal
Sponsor shall determine whether the killing was felonious and intentional for
this purpose.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.6.<b>&#160; Rules of Document Construction.</b>&#160; Whenever appropriate, words used in this SERP
document in the singular may be read in the plural, or words used in the plural
may be read in the singular; the masculine may include the feminine; and the
words &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein&#148; or &#147;hereunder&#148; or</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">7</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">other similar compounds of the word &#147;here&#148; shall mean and refer to the
entire SERP document and not to any particular paragraph or Section of this
SERP document unless the context clearly indicates to the contrary. The titles
given to the various Sections of this SERP document are inserted for
convenience of reference only and are not part of this SERP, and they shall not
be considered in determining the purpose, meaning or intent of any provision
hereof. Notwithstanding any thing apparently to the contrary contained in this
SERP document, the SERP document shall be construed and administered to prevent
the duplication of benefits provided under this SERP and any other qualified or
nonqualified plan maintained in whole or in part by the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.7.<b>&#160; References to Laws.</b>&#160; Any reference in this SERP document to a
statute or regulation shall be considered also to mean and refer to any
subsequent amendment or replacement of that statute or regulation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.8.<b>&#160; Effect on Employment.</b>&#160; Neither the terms of this SERP document nor
the benefits hereunder nor the continuance thereof shall be a term of the
employment of any employee. The terms of this SERP document shall not give any
employee the right to be retained in the employment of any Employer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.9.<b>&#160; Choice of Law.</b>&#160; This SERP document has been executed and
delivered in the State of Minnesota and shall, except to the extent that
federal law is controlling, be construed and enforced in accordance with the
laws of the State of Minnesota.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">8</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1868393\5449-1-kw-07.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 12:33 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">APPENDIX A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">When used in the SERP with initial capital letters, the
following terms shall have the following meanings.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;Cause&#148;</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> shall mean with respect to termination of
Participant&#146;s employment hereunder</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; an act or acts of personal dishonesty by Participant intended to
result in substantial personal enrichment of Participant at the expense of the
Principal Sponsor,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; an act or acts of personal dishonesty by Participant intended to
cause substantial injury to the Principal Sponsor,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; material breach (other than as a result of a Disability) by
Participant of Participant&#146;s obligations under written agreement between the
Principal Sponsor and the Participant which action was</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; undertaken without a reasonable belief that the action was in the
best interest of the Principal Sponsor, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; not remedied within a reasonable period of time after receipt of
written notice from the Principal Sponsor specifying the alleged breach, or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; the conviction of Participant of a felony.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;Change in Control&#148;</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> means any one of the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; The acquisition by any individual, entity or group (within the
meaning of Section&nbsp;13(d)(3) or 14(d)(2) or the Securities Exchange Act of
1934 (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;)) (a &#147;Person&#148;) of beneficial ownership (within the
meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act) of 50% or more
of either (i)&nbsp;the then outstanding shares of Common Stock of Northwest
Airlines Corporation (the &#147;Outstanding Parent Common Stock&#148;) or (ii)&nbsp;the
combined voting power of the then outstanding voting securities of Northwest
Airlines Corporation entitled to vote generally in the election of directors
(the &#147;Outstanding Parent Voting Securities&#148;); or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; Individuals who, as of June&nbsp;1, 1994, constitute the Board of
Directors of Northwest Airlines Corporation (the &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;) cease for
any reason to constitute at least a majority of such Board; provided, however,
that any individual becoming a director subsequent to June&nbsp;1, 1994, whose
election or nomination for election by Northwest Airlines Corporation&#146;s
shareholders, was approved by a vote of at least a majority of the directors
then comprising the Incumbent Board shall be considered as though such
individual were a member of the Incumbent Board, but excluding, for this
purpose, any such individual whose initial assumption of office occurs as a
result of an actual or threatened election contest with respect to the election
or removal of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies
or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Board of Directors or
Northwest Airlines Corporation; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; Approval by the shareholders of Northwest Airlines Corporation of
a reorganization, merger or consolidation (a &#147;Business Combination&#148;), in each
case, unless, following such Business Combination, (i)&nbsp;all or
substantially all of the individuals and entities who were the beneficial
owners, respectively, of the Outstanding Parent Common Stock and Outstanding
Parent Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially
own, directly, or indirectly, more than 50% of, respectively, the then
outstanding shares of common stock and the combined voting power of the then
outstanding voting securities entitled to vote generally in the election of
directors, as the case may be, of the corporation resulting from such</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-</font><font face="Times New Roman">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='A-1',FILE='C:\JMS\rdesika\07-5449-1\task1869184\5449-1-kw-09.htm',USER='105159',CD='Mar 15 13:16 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Business Combination (including,
without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction owns
Northwest Airlines Corporation through one or more subsidiaries) in
substantially the same proportions as their ownership immediately prior to such
Business Combination of the Outstanding Parent Stock and Outstanding Parent
Voting Securities, as the case may be and (ii)&nbsp;at least a majority of the
members of the board of directors of the corporation resulting from such
Business Combination were members of the Incumbent Board at the time of the
execution of the initial agreement or of the action of such Board, providing
for such Business Combination; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; Approval by the shareholders of Northwest Airlines Corporation of
(i)&nbsp;a complete liquidation or dissolution of Northwest Airlines
Corporation or (ii)&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially
all of the assets of Northwest Airlines Corporation, other than to a
corporation with respect to which following such sale or other disposition,
(X)&nbsp;more than 50% of, respectively, the then outstanding shares of common
stock of such corporation and the combined voting power of the then outstanding
voting securities of such corporation entitled to vote generally in the
election of directors is then beneficially owned, directly or indirectly, by
all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who were the
beneficial owners respectively, of the Outstanding Parent Common Stock and
Outstanding Parent Voting Securities immediately prior to such sale or other
disposition in substantially the same proportions as their ownership
immediately prior to such sale or other disposition of the Outstanding Parent
Common Stock and Outstanding Parent Voting Securities, as the case may be and
(Y)&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of such
corporation wee members of the Incumbent Board at the time of the execution of
the initial agreement, or other action of such Board, providing for such sale
or other disposition of assets of Northwest Airlines Corporation or were
elected, appointed or nominated by the Incumbent Board.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;Good Reason&#148;</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;"> shall mean with respect to an Participant, any
one or more of the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; a material reduction in Participant&#146;s compensation or other
benefits (except as permitted hereunder);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; any material change in Participant&#146;s job responsibilities;
provided that, so long as Participant retains a substantial part of his then
current oversight responsibility, a transfer of a portion of such oversight
responsibility of Participant shall not in and of itself constitute a material
change in Participant&#146;s job responsibilities;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; the relocation of the Principal Sponsor&#146;s principal Participant
offices to a location outside the Minneapolis-St. Paul Metropolitan Area;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; a failure by the Principal Sponsor to comply with any material
provision of a written agreement between the Principal Sponsor and the
Participant which has not been cured within ten (10)&nbsp;days after the
Principal Sponsor knows or has notice of such noncompliance.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In order for an Participant&#146;s termination of his employment to be
considered for Good Reason, such termination must occur within one
(1)&nbsp;year after the event giving rise to such Good Reason. Participant&#146;s
continued employment shall not constitute consent to, or a waiver of rights
with respect to, any circumstance constituting Good Reason hereunder.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-</font><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)<br>
Part&nbsp;B</font></b></p>

<div>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)<br>
Part B</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">TABLE OF
CONTENTS</font></b></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='ii',FILE='C:\Fc\74131852477_P66483CHE_1869184\5449-1-kw-11.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar 15 13:18 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)<br>
Part&nbsp;B</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.1.<b>&#160; Plan Established.</b>&#160; Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 1995,
NORTHWEST AIRLINES,&nbsp;INC., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Principal Sponsor&#148;)
establishes this employee benefit plan for the purpose of providing additional
retirement to certain eligible employees in addition to the &#147;final average
earnings formula&#148; or &#147;cash balance formula&#148; benefits provided under the
tax-qualified defined benefit pension plan known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines
Pension Plan for Salaried Employees&#148; (the &#147;Pension Plan&#148;) and the nonqualified
defined benefit pension plan known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Pension Excess
Plan for Salaried Employees&#148; (the &#147;Excess Plan&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.2.<b>&#160; Scope of Part&nbsp;B.</b>&#160; This Part&nbsp;B of the SERP document
(together with the Preamble to the SERP document) contains all the provisions
and rules applicable to the following Participants:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; Each Participant with an effective date for the commencement of
SERP participation that is prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001, who did continue in
active employment with Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. on or after
January&nbsp;1, 2001, and who did affirmatively agree in an Ancillary Agreement
signed after January&nbsp;1, 2001 by the Participant and by the Principal
Sponsor to become covered under Part&nbsp;B, and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; Each Participant with an effective date for the commencement of
SERP participation that is on or after January&nbsp;1, 2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">No portion of this Part&nbsp;B of the SERP document is applicable to any
Participant to whom Part&nbsp;A is applicable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">l.3.<b>&#160; Unfunded Obligation.</b>&#160; The obligation of the Principal Sponsor to
make payments under this SERP constitutes only the unsecured (but legally
enforceable) promise of the Principal Sponsor to make such payments. The
Participant shall have no lien, prior claim or other security interest in any
property of the Principal Sponsor. If a fund is established by the Principal
Sponsor in connection with this SERP, the property therein shall remain the
sole and exclusive property of the Principal Sponsor. The Principal Sponsor
will pay the cost of this SERP out of its general assets.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PLAN NAME</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This employee benefit plan shall be referred to as the &#147;Northwest
Airlines Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan&#148; (the &#147;SERP&#148;) and this portion
of the SERP shall be referred to as Part&nbsp;B. This document, as
distinguished from the plan maintained pursuant to this document, shall be
referred to as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(2001 Restatement)&#148; (the &#147;SERP document&#148;) and this portion of the 2001
Restatement shall be referred to as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#151;Part B&#148; (&#147;Part&nbsp;B of the SERP
document&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 3</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PARTICIPANTS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.1.<b>&#160; Participants.</b>&#160; The Participants in the SERP shall be those
individuals who have been expressly designated as Participants by the Principal
Sponsor in writing by the Chief Executive Officer of the Principal Sponsor. The
effective date for the commencement of SERP participation for each</font></p>


<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">such individual shall be the date specified in such writing. If the
designation is of the Chief Executive Officer, it shall be signed after
January&nbsp;1, 2001 by the Participant and by the Principal Sponsor by the
Chairperson of the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors or by the
Chairperson of the Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.<b>&#160; Continuation of Status.</b>&#160; Any individual who has become a Participant
in the SERP shall continue as a Participant until all benefits which are due
under this SERP have been received without regard to whether he or she
continues as an officer or a participant in the Pension Plan or an active
employee.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 4</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">BENEFITS PAYABLE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.<b>&#160; Benefit for Participants.</b></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.1.<i>&#160; </i><b>Entitlement and Amount.</b>&#160; Upon the Termination of Employment of a Participant
who has any Vested and nonforfeitable entitlement to an Accrued Benefit under
the Pension Plan, this SERP shall pay to a Participant the excess, if any, of
the greater of the amount determined pursuant to (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;below
subject to the special rules in (c)&nbsp;below. Participants who were not
employed prior to January&nbsp;1, 2001 do not have any benefit under the SERP
FAE formula calculation in (a)&nbsp;below and, therefore, shall have their
benefits calculated exclusively pursuant to (b)&nbsp;below.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

  Single Life Benefit commencing after Normal Retirement Date) if the following
  special rules had been applied:</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Assume that the Participant&#146;s actual
  Benefit Service was increased by such amount or amounts of deemed years of
  Benefit Service, if any, as may be provided in the Participant&#146;s Ancillary
  Agreement pursuant to Section 4.3, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Compute the Participant&#146;s Earnings
  and Final Average Earnings on the basis of thirty-six (36) months rather than
  sixty (60) months and without regard to whether those thirty- six (36) months
  are consecutive, and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Include in Earnings and Final
  Average Earnings amounts not otherwise included because they were deferred at
  the election of the Participant under a nonqualified deferred compensation
  plan at the time or times when they would have been included but for such
  election to defer; and</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Spread bonuses other than bonuses
  paid under the Key Employee Annual Cash Incentive Program (e.g., &#147;sign on
  bonuses&#148; and &#147;project bonuses&#148;) evenly over the twelve (12) months in the
  calendar year in which such bonuses are paid when determining Earnings and
  Final Average Earnings. </font></p>
  </td>

  If CB Benefit</b>. Compute the Cash Balance Account, if any, that
  would have been accumulated for the Participant under the Pension Plan if the

  any, in the Participant&#146;s Ancillary Agreement pursuant to Section 4.3 insofar

  under a nonqualified deferred compensation plan at the time or times when

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>Subtraction</b>.
  Subtract the greater of the amount determined in (3) or (4) above from the amount
  determined in (2) above and the resulting amount shall be the benefit payable
  to the Participant under this SERP (unless the amount determined in Section
  4.1.1(b)(5) is greater). </font></p>
