  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:50.24%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>Subtraction</b>.
  Subtract the greater of the amount determined in (3) or (4) above from the
  amount determined in (2) above and the resulting amount shall be the benefit
  payable to the Participant under this SERP (unless the amount determined in
  Section 4.1.1(a)(5) is greater).</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)<b>&#160;&#160; Transitional Rules</b>.
With regard to a Participant who was a Participant before January&nbsp;1, 2001,
the year 2000 bonus (paid in 2001) under the Key Employee Cash Incentive
Program was taken into account in determining the initial account balance under
the CB Formula. Pay credits will not be granted with regard to year 2000 bonus
(paid in 2001) under the Key Employee Cash Incentive Program. Pre-2001 deemed
service granted under the SERP or under any Ancillary Agreement pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.3 was taken into account in determining the initial account balance.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1.2.<i>&#160; </i><b>Form of Payment.</b>&#160; This benefit (minus the withholding, payroll
and other taxes which must be deducted therefrom) shall be paid, as soon as
administratively feasible (but not more than one hundred fifty days) after
Termination of Employment, to the Participant in a single lump sum payment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.<b>&#160; Benefit for SERP Beneficiaries.</b></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.1.<i>&#160; </i><b>Entitlement and Amount.</b>&#160; Upon the death of a Participant prior to the
time the Participant&#146;s benefit has been paid to the Participant, the benefit
shall be payable to the SERP beneficiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.2.<i>&#160; </i><b>Form of Payment.</b>&#160; This benefit (minus the withholding, payroll
and other taxes which must be deducted therefrom) shall be paid, as soon as
administratively feasible after the Participant&#146;s death, to the SERP
beneficiary in a single lump sum payment.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.3.<b>&#160; Ancillary Agreements.</b>&#160; A Participant and the Chief Executive Officer
of the Principal Sponsor shall enter into a written Ancillary Agreement which
shall evidence the Participant&#146;s entitlement to benefits under the SERP and may
specify additional terms and conditions upon which the Participant&#146;s benefits
shall be determined. With respect to any such Participant, the provisions of
such written Ancillary Agreement shall be given effect under this SERP as if
fully set forth herein. If the written Ancillary Agreement is with the Chief
Executive Officer, it shall be signed on behalf of the Principal Sponsor by the
Chairperson of the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors or by the
Chairperson of the Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 5</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">FUNDING</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.1.<b>&#160; Hedging Investments.</b>&#160; If the Principal Sponsor elects to finance
all or a portion of its costs in connection with this SERP through the purchase
of life insurance or other investments, the Participant agrees, as a condition
of participation in this SERP, to cooperate with the Principal Sponsor in the
purchase of such investment to any extent reasonably required by the Principal
Sponsor and relinquishes any claim he or she may have either for himself or
herself or any beneficiary to the proceeds of any such investment or any other
rights or interests in such investment. If a Participant fails or refuses to
cooperate, then notwithstanding any other provision of this SERP (including,
without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Section&nbsp;4) the Principal
Sponsor shall immediately and irrevocably terminate and forfeit the Participant&#146;s
entitlement to benefits under the SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.2.<b>&#160; Corporate Obligation.</b>&#160; Neither the Principal Sponsor&#146;s officers nor
any member of its Board of Directors in any way secures or guarantees the
payment of any benefit or amount which may become due and payable hereunder to
or with respect to any Participant. Each Participant and other person entitled
at any time to payments hereunder shall look solely to the assets of the
Principal Sponsor for such payments as an unsecured, general creditor. After
benefits shall have been paid to or with respect to a Participant and such
payment purports to cover in full the benefit hereunder, such former
Participant or other person or persons, as the case may be, shall have no
further right or interest in the other assets of the Principal Sponsor in
connection with this SERP. Neither the Principal Sponsor nor any of its
officers nor any member of its Boards of Directors shall be under any liability
or responsibility for failure to effect any of the objectives or purposes of
the SERP by reason of the insolvency of the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 6</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">GENERAL MATTERS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.1.<b>&#160; Amendments.</b>&#160; This SERP may be amended by action of the
Principal Sponsor without the consent of any Participant in whole or in part,
from time to time and at any time; <b>provided,
however</b>, that no amendment of this SERP shall be effective as to a
Participant to the extent the amendment would have the effect of diminishing
the benefits payable to or with respect to the Participant under this SERP or
the procedural rights of the Participant under this SERP unless the Participant
has consented to such amendment in writing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.2.<b>&#160; ERISA Administrator.</b>&#160; The Principal Sponsor shall be the plan
administrator of this SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.3.<b>&#160; Service of Process.</b>&#160; In the absence of any designation to the
contrary by the Principal Sponsor, the Secretary of the Principal Sponsor is
designated as the appropriate and exclusive agent for the receipt of service of
process directed to the Plan in any legal proceeding, including arbitration,
involving the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.4.<b>&#160; Limited Benefits.</b>&#160; This SERP shall not provide any benefits
determined with respect to any defined contribution plan.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.5.<b>&#160; Spendthrift Provision.</b>&#160; No Participant, surviving spouse, joint or
contingent annuitant or beneficiary shall have the power to transmit, assign,
alienate, dispose of, pledge or encumber any benefit payable under this SERP
before its actual payment to such person. The Principal Sponsor shall not
recognize any such effort to convey any interest under this SERP. No benefit
payable under this SERP shall be subject to attachment, garnishment, execution
following judgment or other legal process before actual payment to such person.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.6.<b>&#160; Certifications.</b>&#160; Information to be supplied or written notices
to be made or consents to be given by the Principal Sponsor pursuant to any
provision of this SERP may be signed in the name of the Principal Sponsor by
any officer who has been authorized to make such certification or to give such
notices or consents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6.7.<b>&#160; Errors in Computations.</b>&#160; The Principal Sponsor shall not be liable or
responsible for any error in the computation of any benefit payable to or with
respect to any Participant resulting from any misstatement of fact made by the
Participant or by or on behalf of any survivor to whom such benefit shall be
payable, directly or indirectly, to the Principal Sponsor, and used by the
Principal Sponsor in determining the benefit. The Principal Sponsor shall not
be obligated or required to increase the benefit payable to or with respect to
such Participant which, on discovery of the misstatement, is found to be
understated as a result of such misstatement of the Participant. However, the benefit
of any Participant which is overstated by reason of any such misstatement or
any other reason shall be reduced to the amount appropriate in view of the
truth (and to recover any prior overpayment).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 7</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DESIGNATION OF
BENEFICIARIES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.1.<b>&#160; Right To Designate.</b>&#160; Each Participant may designate, upon forms to
be furnished by and filed with the Principal Sponsor, one or more primary SERP
beneficiaries or alternative SERP beneficiaries to receive all or a specified
part of the Participant&#146;s benefit in the event of the Participant&#146;s death. The
Participant may change or revoke any such designation from time to time without
notice to or consent from any SERP beneficiary or spouse. No such designation,
change or revocation shall be effective unless executed by the Participant and
received by the Principal Sponsor in its retirement administration department
prior to the Participant&#146;s death. The Principal Sponsor may establish rules for
the use of electronic signatures in executing SERP beneficiary designations. Until
such rules are established, electronic signatures shall not be effective. The
designation of a Beneficiary under the Pension Plan shall not be effective to
designate a SERP beneficiary (and vice versa).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.2.<b>&#160; Failure of Designation.</b>&#160; If a Participant:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; fails to designate a SERP beneficiary,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; designates a SERP beneficiary and thereafter such designation is
revoked without another SERP beneficiary being named, or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; designates one or more SERP beneficiaries and all such SERP
beneficiaries so designated fail to survive the Participant,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">such Participant&#146;s benefit, or the part thereof as to which such
Participant&#146;s designation fails, as the case may be, shall be payable to the
first class of the following classes of automatic SERP beneficiaries with a
member surviving the Participant and (except in the case of the Participant&#146;s
surviving issue) in equal shares if there is more than one member in such class
surviving the Participant:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Participant&#146;s surviving spouse<br>
Participant&#146;s surviving issue per stirpes and not per capita<br>
Participant&#146;s surviving parents</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Participant&#146;s surviving brothers
and sisters<br>
Representative of Participant&#146;s estate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.3.<b>&#160; Disclaimers by SERP Beneficiaries.</b>&#160; A SERP beneficiary entitled to a distribution
of all or a portion of a deceased Participant&#146;s benefit may disclaim his or her
interest therein subject to the following requirements. To be eligible to
disclaim, a SERP beneficiary must be a natural person, must not have received a
distribution of all or any portion of a benefit at the time such disclaimer is
executed and delivered, and must have attained at least age twenty-one
(21)&nbsp;years as of the date of the Participant&#146;s death. Any disclaimer must
be in writing and must be executed personally by the SERP beneficiary before a
notary public. The Principal Sponsor may establish rules for the use of
electronic signatures and acknowledgements. Until such rules are established,
electronic signatures and acknowledgements shall not be effective. A disclaimer
shall state that the SERP beneficiary&#146;s entire interest in the undistributed
benefit is disclaimed (partial disclaimers not being permitted under this
Plan). To be effective, an original executed copy of the disclaimer must be
executed and actually delivered to the Principal Sponsor after the date of the
Participant&#146;s death but not later than nine (9)&nbsp;months after the date of
the Participant&#146;s death. A disclaimer shall be irrevocable when delivered to
the Principal Sponsor. A disclaimer shall be considered to be delivered to the
Principal Sponsor only when actually received by the Principal Sponsor. The
Principal Sponsor shall be the sole judge of the content, interpretation and
validity of a purported disclaimer. Upon the filing of a valid disclaimer, the
SERP beneficiary shall be considered not to have survived the Participant as to
the interest disclaimed. A disclaimer by a SERP beneficiary shall not be
considered to be a transfer of an interest in violation of the provisions of
Section&nbsp;6.5. No other form of attempted disclaimer shall be recognized by
the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.4.<b>&#160; Definitions.</b>&#160; When used herein and, unless the Participant
has otherwise specified in the Participant&#146;s SERP beneficiary designation, when
used in a SERP beneficiary designation:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; &#147;issue&#148; means all persons who are lineal descendants of the person
whose issue are referred to, subject to the following: (i)&nbsp;a legally
adopted child and the adopted child&#146;s lineal descendants always shall be lineal
descendants of each adoptive parent (and of each adoptive parent&#146;s lineal
ancestors); (ii)&nbsp;a legally adopted child and the adopted child&#146;s lineal
descendants never shall be lineal descendants of any former parent whose
parental rights were terminated by the adoption (or of that former parent&#146;s
lineal ancestors); except that if, after a child&#146;s parent has died, the child
is legally adopted by a stepparent who is the spouse of the child&#146;s surviving
parent, the child and the child&#146;s lineal descendants shall remain lineal
descendants of the deceased parent (and the deceased parent&#146;s lineal
ancestors); and (iii)&nbsp;if the person (or a lineal descendant of the person)
whose issue are referred to is the parent of a child (or is treated as such
under applicable law) but never received the child into that parent&#146;s home and
never openly held out the child as that parent&#146;s child (unless doing so was
precluded solely by death), then neither the child nor the child&#146;s lineal
descendants shall be issue of the person.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; &#147;child&#148; means an issue of the first generation;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; &#147;per stirpes&#148; means in equal shares among living children of the
person whose issue are referred to and the issue (taken collectively) of each
deceased child of such person, with such issue taking by right of
representation of such deceased child; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; &#147;survive&#148; and &#147;surviving&#148; mean living after the death of the
Participant.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7.5.<b>&#160; Special Rules.</b>&#160; Unless the Participant has otherwise
specified in the Participant&#146;s SERP beneficiary designation, the following
rules shall apply:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; If there is not sufficient evidence that a SERP beneficiary was
living at the time of the death of the Participant, it shall be deemed that the
SERP beneficiary was not living at the time of the death of the Participant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; The automatic SERP beneficiaries specified in Section&nbsp;6.9.3
and the SERP beneficiaries designated by the Participant shall become fixed at
the time of the Participant&#146;s death so that, if a SERP beneficiary survives the
Participant but dies before the receipt of all payments due such SERP
beneficiary hereunder, such remaining payments shall be payable to the
representative of such SERP beneficiary&#146;s estate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; If the Participant designates as a SERP beneficiary the person who
is the Participant&#146;s spouse on the date of the designation, either by name or
by relationship, or both, the dissolution, annulment or other legal termination
of the marriage between the Participant and such person shall automatically
revoke such designation. (The foregoing shall not prevent the Participant from
designating a former spouse as a SERP beneficiary on a form executed by the
Participant and received by the Principal Sponsor after the date of the legal
termination of the marriage between the Participant and such former spouse, and
during the Participant&#146;s lifetime.)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; Any designation of a nonspouse SERP beneficiary by name that is
accompanied by a description of relationship to the Participant shall be given
effect without regard to whether the relationship to the Participant exists
either then or at the Participant&#146;s death.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(e)&#160;&#160; Any designation of a SERP beneficiary only by statement of
relationship to the Participant shall be effective only to designate the person
or persons standing in such relationship to the Participant at the Participant&#146;s
death.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160; A SERP beneficiary designation is permanently void if it either
is executed or is filed by a Participant who, at the time of such execution or
filing, is then a minor under the law of the state of the Participant&#146;s legal
residence. The Principal Sponsor shall be the sole judge of the content, interpretation
and validity of a purported SERP beneficiary designation.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 8</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CLAIMS PROCEDURE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.1.<b>&#160; Initiating Benefits.</b>&#160; The Principal Sponsor, upon learning of the
Termination of Employment or death of a Participant shall on its own initiative
commence the procedures to make distribution. If two or more persons are
claiming the same benefit, the Principal Sponsor may withhold payment until the
identity of the person entitled to the payment is established. The Principal
Sponsor may require of the Participant or SERP beneficiary information that it
reasonably determines is required for it to perform its obligations hereunder.
At the earliest time that a Participant may be entitled to receive benefits
under this SERP, the Principal Sponsor shall notify the Participant of that
entitlement and of the procedures for paying benefits hereunder. Without regard
to the foregoing, a Participant may request payment of benefits under this
SERP. The Principal Sponsor shall, upon receipt of such request expeditiously
process the payment of benefits hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.2.<b>&#160; Original Claim.</b>&#160; Any person may file with the Principal
Sponsor a written claim for benefits under the SERP. Within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days after the filing of such a claim, the Principal Sponsor shall
notify the claimant in writing whether his or her claim is upheld or denied in
whole or in part or shall furnish the claimant a written notice describing
specific special circumstances requiring a specified amount of additional time
(but not more than sixty days from the date the claim was filed) to reach a</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">decision on the claim. If the claim is denied in whole or in part, the
Principal Sponsor shall state in writing:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; the specific reasons for the denial;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; the specific references to the pertinent provisions of this SERP
on which the denial is based;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; a description of any additional material or information necessary
for the claimant to perfect the claim and an explanation of why such material
or information is necessary; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; an explanation of the claims review procedure set forth in this
section.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.3.<b>&#160; Claims Review Procedure.</b>&#160; Within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt of
notice that his or her claim has been denied in whole or in part, the claimant
may file with the Principal Sponsor a written request for a review and may, in
conjunction therewith, submit written issues and comments. Within thirty
(30)&nbsp;days after the filing of such a request for review, the Principal
Sponsor shall notify the claimant in writing whether, upon review, the claim
was upheld or denied in whole or in part or shall furnish the claimant a
written notice describing specific special circumstances requiring a specified
amount of additional time (but not more than sixty days from the date the
request for review was filed) to reach a decision on the request for review.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8.4.<b>&#160; General Rules.</b></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)&#160;&#160; No inquiry or question shall be deemed to be a claim or a request
for a review of a denied claim unless made in accordance with the claims
procedure. The Principal Sponsor may require that any claim for benefits and
any request for a review of a denied claim be filed on forms to be furnished by
the Principal Sponsor upon request.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)&#160;&#160; All decisions on claims and on requests for a review of denied
claims shall be made by the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)&#160;&#160; The Principal Sponsor may, in its discretion, hold one or more
hearings on a claim or a request for a review of a denied claim.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)&#160;&#160; Claimants may be represented by a lawyer or other representative
(at their own expense). A claimant&#146;s representative shall be entitled to receive
copies of notices sent to the claimant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(e)&#160;&#160; The decision of the Principal Sponsor on a claim and on a request
for a review of a denied claim shall be served on the claimant in writing. If a
decision or notice is not received by a claimant within the time specified, the
claim or request for a review of a denied claim shall be deemed to have been
denied.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160; Prior to filing a claim or a request for a review of a denied
claim, the claimant or his or her representative shall have a reasonable
opportunity to review a copy of this SERP and all other pertinent documents in
the possession of the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(g)&#160;&#160; The Principal Sponsor may permanently or temporarily delegate all
or a portion of its authority and responsibility under this Section&nbsp;8 to a
committee or individual.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(h)&#160;&#160; The procedures and remedies herein are not exclusive. However, a
claimant shall be required to exhaust these administrative remedies before
commencing litigation to recover benefits. If there is litigation regarding the
benefits payable to or with respect to a Participant, determinations by the
Principal Sponsor shall not be afforded any deference and the matter shall be
heard <i>de novo</i>.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SECTION 9</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSTRUCTION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.1.<b>&#160; Defined Terms.</b>&#160; Words and phrases used in this SERP document
with initial capital letters, which are defined in the Pension Plan documents
and which are not separately defined in this SERP document shall have the same
meaning ascribed to them in the Pension Plan documents unless in the context in
which they are used it would be clearly inappropriate to do so.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.2.<b>&#160; ERISA Status.</b>&#160; This SERP is adopted with the understanding
that it is an unfunded plan maintained primarily for the purpose of providing
deferred compensation for a select group of management or highly compensated
employees as provided in section&nbsp;201(2), section&nbsp;301(3) and
section&nbsp;401(a)(1) of ERISA. Each provision shall be interpreted and
administered accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.3.<b>&#160; IRC Status.</b>&#160; This SERP is intended to be a nonqualified
deferred compensation arrangement. The rules of section&nbsp;401(a) <i>et. seq.</i> of the Code shall not apply to
this SERP. The rules of section&nbsp;3121(v)&nbsp;and section&nbsp;3306(r)(2)
of the Code shall apply to this SERP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.4.<b>&#160; Effect on Other Plans.</b>&#160; This SERP shall not alter, enlarge or
diminish any person&#146;s employment rights or obligations or rights or obligations
under the Pension Plan, the Excess Plan or any other plan. It is specifically
contemplated that the Pension Plan and Excess Plan could, from time to time, be
amended and possibly terminated. This SERP shall not preclude any such
amendments or terminations. Although the Principal Sponsor is generally free to
amend and terminate the Pension Plan and the Excess Plan, no amendment or
termination of the Pension Plan or the Excess Plan shall be effective as to a
Participant to the extent the amendment or termination would have the effect of
diminishing the benefits payable to or with respect to the Participant under
this SERP unless the Participant has affirmatively agreed in writing to such
amendment or termination.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.5.<b>&#160; Disqualification.</b>&#160; Notwithstanding any other provision of this
SERP document or any election or designation made under the SERP, any
individual who feloniously and intentionally kills a Participant shall be
deemed for all purposes of this SERP and all elections and designations made
under this SERP to have died before such Participant. A final judgment of
conviction of felonious and intentional killing is conclusive for this purpose.
In the absence of a conviction of felonious and intentional killing, the
Principal Sponsor shall determine whether the killing was felonious and
intentional for this purpose.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.6.<b>&#160; Rules of Document Construction.</b>&#160; Whenever appropriate, words used in the SERP
document in the singular may be read in the plural, or words used in the plural
may be read in the singular; the masculine may include the feminine; and the
words &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein&#148; or &#147;hereunder&#148; or other similar compounds of the word &#147;here&#148;
shall mean and refer to the entire SERP and not to any particular paragraph or
Section of this SERP document unless the context clearly indicates to the
contrary. The titles given to the various Sections of this SERP document are
inserted for convenience of reference only and are not part of this SERP
document, and they shall not be considered in determining the purpose, meaning
or intent of any provision hereof. Notwithstanding any thing apparently to the
contrary contained in this SERP document, the SERP document shall be construed
and administered to prevent the duplication of benefits provided under this
SERP and any other qualified or nonqualified plan maintained in whole or in
part by the Principal Sponsor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.7.<b>&#160; References to Laws.</b>&#160; Any reference in this SERP document to a
statute or regulation shall be considered also to mean and refer to any
subsequent amendment or replacement of that statute or regulation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.8.<b>&#160; Effect on Employment.</b>&#160; Neither the terms of this SERP document nor
the benefits hereunder nor the continuance thereof shall be a term of the
employment of any employee. The terms</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">of this SERP document shall not give any employee the right to be
retained in the employment of any Employer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9.9.<b>&#160; Choice of Law.</b>&#160; This SERP document has been executed and
delivered in the State of Minnesota and shall, except to the extent that
federal law is controlling, be construed and enforced in accordance with the
laws of the State of Minnesota.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Ancillary
Agreement<br>
under</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, Made and entered into by and between Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Employer&#148;) and Richard H.
Anderson (the &#147;Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Employer has established a nonqualified plan of
deferred compensation for the benefit of a group of management employees
currently set forth in a document entitled &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#148; (hereinafter the &#147;2001 SERP
Restatement&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Plan maintained pursuant to the 2001 SERP
Restatement (sometimes referred to as the &#147;SERP&#148;) contemplates that certain
terms and provisions may be varied pursuant to a separate written agreement by
and between Employer and Participant known as an &#147;Ancillary Agreement&#148;; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Employer and the Participant agree that upon
executing this Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s SERP benefit will be computed
under and governed solely by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement and not
Part&nbsp;A of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY AGREED</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, By and between Employer and Participant as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DATE OF PARTICIPATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Participant&#146;s effective date for the
commencement of SERP participation is March&nbsp;24, 1994.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PRIOR SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Under a prior Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s
actual Benefit Service was increased by two additional deemed years of Benefit
Service for each actual year of employment completed by Participant after
March&nbsp;23, 1994, (not to exceed ten years) as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="349" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:261.75pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">March 24, 1998
  to March 23, 1999</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:66.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="349" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:261.75pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:66.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="349" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:261.75pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total Already
  Earned</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:66.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NEW SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.6 of the Management
Compensation Agreement dated as of June&nbsp;28, 2001 between the Employer and
the Participant (the &#147;Compensation Agreement&#148;) in addition to the deemed Benefit
Service awarded under paragraph&nbsp;2 above, Participant&#146;s actual Benefit
Service shall be increased by one additional deemed year of Benefit</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Service for each actual year of
employment completed by the Participant after April&nbsp;1, 2001, (not to
exceed five additional deemed years of Benefit Service) as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(b)(ii)&nbsp;of the Compensation Agreement,
in the event the Participant&#146;s employment is terminated by the Employer other
than for Cause (as defined in the Compensation Agreement), as a result of death
or Disability (as defined in the Compensation Agreement), or by the Participant
for Good Reason (as defined in the Compensation Agreement), Participant&#146;s
actual Benefit Service as of the effective date of such termination of
employment shall be increased in an amount equal to the excess, if any, of
(i)&nbsp;five over (ii)&nbsp;the number of additional years of Benefit Service
that the Participant has accrued as of such termination date pursuant to this
paragraph&nbsp;3.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SPECIAL ARRANGEMENTS</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. For the purpose of computing Participant&#146;s
benefits under Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP, the following special rules shall
apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; FAE Formula</b>.
For the purposes of computing Participant&#146;s Final Average Earnings Annuity
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(a)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement,
Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased by the deemed years of
Benefit Service earned under paragraphs 2 and 3 above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">b)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Initial Account</b>.
Participant&#146;s initial account balance for purposes of
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP has been
computed on a basis consistent with the Pension Plan formula for computing
initial account balances and, where appropriate, takes into account all years
of Participant&#146;s deemed service attributable to periods before January&nbsp;1,
2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">c)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Increased Pay Credit
Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s applicable
pay credit percentage pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the
2001 SERP Restatement the Participant shall receive (during the period from
April&nbsp;1, 2001 through March&nbsp;31, 2006) two times the pay credit that
the Participant would otherwise be entitled to receive (i.e., the &#147;actual&#148; plus
one &#147;deemed&#148;). Therefore, the Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
during the following periods shall be as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->With&nbsp;respect&nbsp;to&nbsp;Participant&#146;s&nbsp;Earnings<br>
  attributable&nbsp;to&nbsp;the&nbsp;following&nbsp;periods:</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  applicable&nbsp;pay&nbsp;credit<br>
  percentage&nbsp;shall&nbsp;be:</font></b></p>

 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2005 to
  February 28, 2006</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">March 1, 2006 to March
  31, 2006</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">d)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Generally Applicable
Pay Credit Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s
applicable pay credit percentage pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement during the
period from January&nbsp;1, 2001 through March&nbsp;31, 2001 and periods
subsequent to March&nbsp;31, 2006, Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit
percentage shall be</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-13.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:43 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">determined under the generally
applicable rules of the Pension Plan; provided, however, that in applying those
rules, Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased by all
additional earned deemed years of Benefit Service.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSENT TO AMENDMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.1
of the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(1995 Statement),&#148; Participant consents to the amendments of that document that
are embodied in the restatement of that document previously adopted by
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 SERP Restatement).&#148; Participant acknowledges
prior receipt of a copy of that document. Participant acknowledges that the
benefits payable to or with respect to Participant under the SERP shall be
governed exclusively by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">6)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTEGRATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This agreement is intended to be and is an Ancillary Agreement as that
term is used in the SERP. Insofar as this Ancillary Agreement relates to
Participant&#146;s entitlement under the SERP, this Ancillary Agreement represents
the entire agreement of Participant and Employer and supercedes all prior
agreements and understandings, written or otherwise. In no event shall this
Ancillary Agreement and any other agreement be construed or interpreted to
provide duplicate benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Employer and Participant have
executed this Ancillary Agreement as of October&nbsp;25, 2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Ancillary
Agreement<br>
under</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, Made and entered into by and between Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Employer&#148;) and Douglas M.
Steenland (the &#147;Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Employer has established a nonqualified plan of
deferred compensation for the benefit of a group of management employees
currently set forth in a document entitled &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#148; (hereinafter the &#147;2001 SERP
Restatement&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Plan maintained pursuant to the 2001 SERP
Restatement (sometimes referred to as the &#147;SERP&#148;) contemplates that certain
terms and provisions may be varied pursuant to a separate written agreement by
and between Employer and Participant known as an &#147;Ancillary Agreement&#148;; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Employer and the Participant agree that upon
executing this Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s SERP benefit will be computed
under and governed solely by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement and not
Part&nbsp;A of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY AGREED</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, By and between Employer and Participant as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">7)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DATE OF PARTICIPATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Participant&#146;s effective date for the
commencement of SERP participation is March&nbsp;24, 1994.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">8)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PRIOR SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Under a prior Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s
actual Benefit Service was increased by two additional deemed years of Benefit
Service for each actual year of employment completed by Participant after March&nbsp;23,
1994, (not to exceed ten years) as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">

  Periods:</p>

  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:66.7pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Additional&nbsp;Deemed<br>

  <td width="349" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:261.75pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total Already Earned</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="89" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:66.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">9)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NEW SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.6 of the Management
Compensation Agreement dated as of June&nbsp;28, 2001 between the Employer and
the Participant (the &#147;Compensation Agreement&#148;) in addition to the deemed
Benefit Service awarded under paragraph&nbsp;2 above, Participant&#146;s actual
Benefit Service shall be increased by one additional deemed year of Benefit
Service for each actual year of employment completed by the Participant after
April&nbsp;1, 2001, (not to exceed five additional deemed years of Benefit
Service) as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">15</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(b)(ii)&nbsp;of the
Compensation Agreement, in the event the Participant&#146;s employment is terminated
by the Employer other than for Cause (as defined in the Compensation
Agreement), as a result of death or Disability (as defined in the Compensation
Agreement), or by the Participant for Good Reason (as defined in the
Compensation Agreement), Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service as of the
effective date of such termination of employment shall be increased in an
amount equal to the excess, if any, of (i)&nbsp;five over (ii)&nbsp;the number
of additional years of Benefit Service that the Participant has accrued as of
such termination date pursuant to this paragraph&nbsp;3.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">10)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SPECIAL ARRANGEMENTS</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. For the purpose of computing Participant&#146;s
benefits under Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP, the following special rules shall
apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; FAE Formula</b>.
For the purposes of computing Participant&#146;s Final Average Earnings Annuity
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(a)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement,
Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased by the deemed years of
Benefit Service earned under paragraphs 2 and 3 above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">b)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Initial Account</b>.
Participant&#146;s initial account balance for purposes of
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP has been
computed on a basis consistent with the Pension Plan formula for computing
initial account balances and, where appropriate, takes into account all years
of Participant&#146;s deemed service attributable to periods before January&nbsp;1,
2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">c)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Increased Pay Credit
Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s applicable
pay credit percentage pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the
2001 SERP Restatement the Participant shall receive (during the period from
April&nbsp;1, 2001 through March&nbsp;31, 2006) two times the pay credit that
the Participant would otherwise be entitled to receive (i.e., the &#147;actual&#148; plus
one &#147;deemed&#148;). Therefore, the Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
during the following periods shall be as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->With&nbsp;respect&nbsp;to&nbsp;Participant&#146;s&nbsp;Earnings<br>
  attributable&nbsp;to&nbsp;the&nbsp;following&nbsp;periods:</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  applicable&nbsp;pay&nbsp;credit<br>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2005 to March 31, 2006</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">d)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Generally Applicable
Pay Credit Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s
applicable pay credit percentage pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement during the
period from January&nbsp;1, 2001 through March&nbsp;31, 2001 and periods
subsequent to March&nbsp;31, 2006, Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit
percentage shall be determined under the generally applicable rules of the
Pension Plan; provided, however, that in applying those rules, Participant&#146;s
actual Benefit Service shall be increased by all additional earned deemed years
of Benefit Service.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">11)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSENT TO AMENDMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.1
of the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(1995 Statement),&#148; Participant consents to the amendments of that document that
are embodied in the restatement of that document previously adopted by
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 SERP Restatement).&#148; Participant acknowledges
prior receipt of a copy of that document. Participant acknowledges that the
benefits payable to or with respect to</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">16</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='16',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Participant under the SERP shall
be governed exclusively by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">12)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTEGRATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This agreement is intended to be and is an Ancillary Agreement as that
term is used in the SERP. Insofar as this Ancillary Agreement relates to
Participant&#146;s entitlement under the SERP, this Ancillary Agreement represents
the entire agreement of Participant and Employer and supercedes all prior
agreements and understandings, written or otherwise. In no event shall this
Ancillary Agreement and any other agreement be construed or interpreted to
provide duplicate benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Employer and Participant have
executed this Ancillary Agreement as of October&nbsp;25, 2001.</font></p>
