 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">17</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='17',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Ancillary
Agreement<br>
under</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, Made and entered into by and between Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Employer&#148;) and Mickey P.
Foret (the &#147;Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Employer has established a nonqualified plan of
deferred compensation for the benefit of a group of management employees
currently set forth in a document entitled &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#148; (hereinafter the &#147;2001 SERP
Restatement&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Plan maintained pursuant to the 2001 SERP
Restatement (sometimes referred to as the &#147;SERP&#148;) contemplates that certain
terms and provisions may be varied pursuant to a separate written agreement by
and between Employer and Participant known as an &#147;Ancillary Agreement&#148;; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Employer and the Participant agree that upon
executing this Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s SERP benefit will be computed
under and governed solely by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement and not
Part&nbsp;A of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY AGREED</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, By and between Employer and Participant as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">13)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DATE OF PARTICIPATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Participant&#146;s effective date for the
commencement of SERP participation is May&nbsp;11, 1998.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">14)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">PRIOR SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Employer and Participant agree that as of
April&nbsp;1, 2001, Participant has 18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;"> 1</font><font face="Symbol" style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#164;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:1.0pt;">2</font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;years of
Benefit Service consisting of 6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;"> 1</font><font face="Symbol" style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#164;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;position:relative;top:1.0pt;">2</font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;years of
Benefit Service under the Qualified and Excess Pension Plans and 12&nbsp;years
of deemed Benefit Service under the SERP. Employer and Participant further
agree that on April&nbsp;30, 2001, Employer will credit to Participant&#146;s SERP
cash balance account an amount equal to $454,500.00.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">15)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NEW SERP AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;5 of the Letter
Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;23, 2002 between the Employer and the
Participant (the &#147;Letter Agreement&#148;) in addition to the deemed Benefit Service
awarded under paragraph&nbsp;2 above, Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service
shall be increased by two additional deemed years of Benefit Service for each
actual year of employment completed by the Participant commencing on
April&nbsp;1, 2001, (not to exceed eight additional deemed years of Benefit
Service) as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">

  <td width="349" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:261.75pt;">

  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="4" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.0pt;">

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">16)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SPECIAL ARRANGEMENTS</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. For the purpose of computing Participant&#146;s
benefits under Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP, the following special rules shall
apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; FAE Formula</b>.
For the purposes of computing Participant&#146;s Final Average Earnings Annuity
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(a)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement,
Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased by the deemed years of
Benefit Service earned under paragraphs 2 and 3 above.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">18</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='18',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">b)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Initial Account</b>.
Participant&#146;s initial account balance for purposes of
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP has been
computed on a basis consistent with the Pension Plan formula for computing
initial account balances and, where appropriate, takes into account all years
of Participant&#146;s deemed service attributable to periods before January&nbsp;1,
2001.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">c)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Increased Pay Credit
Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s applicable
pay credit percentage pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the
2001 SERP Restatement the Participant shall receive (during the period from
April&nbsp;1, 2001 through March&nbsp;31, 2005) three times the pay credit that
the Participant would otherwise be entitled to receive (i.e., the &#147;actual&#148; plus
two &#147;deemed&#148;). Therefore, the Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
during the following periods shall be as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->With&nbsp;respect&nbsp;to&nbsp;Participant&#146;s&nbsp;Earnings<br>
  attributable&nbsp;to&nbsp;the&nbsp;following&nbsp;periods:</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Participant&#146;s<br>
  applicable&nbsp;pay&nbsp;credit<br>
  percentage&nbsp;shall&nbsp;be:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2001 to March
  31, 2002</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">45</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2002 to
  February 28, 2003</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">45</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">March 1, 2003 to March
  31, 2003</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">54</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2003 to March
  31, 2004</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">

  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">54</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">April 1, 2004 to March 31, 2005</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">54</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">d)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Generally Applicable
Pay Credit Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s
applicable pay credit percentage pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement during periods
subsequent to March&nbsp;31, 2005, Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit
percentage shall be determined under the generally applicable rules of the
Pension Plan; provided, however, that in applying those rules, Participant&#146;s
actual Benefit Service shall be increased by all additional earned deemed years
of Benefit Service.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">17)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSENT TO AMENDMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.1
of the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(1995 Statement),&#148; Participant consents to the amendments of that document that
are embodied in the restatement of that document previously adopted by
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 SERP Restatement).&#148; Participant acknowledges
prior receipt of a copy of that document. Participant acknowledges that the
benefits payable to or with respect to Participant under the SERP shall be
governed exclusively by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">18)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTEGRATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This agreement is intended to be and is an Ancillary Agreement as that
term is used in the SERP. Insofar as this Ancillary Agreement relates to
Participant&#146;s entitlement under the SERP, this Ancillary Agreement represents
the entire agreement of Participant and Employer and supercedes all prior
agreements and understandings, written or otherwise. In no event shall this
Ancillary Agreement and any other agreement be construed or interpreted to
provide duplicate benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Employer and Participant have
executed this Ancillary Agreement as of October&nbsp;25, 2001.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

  </td>

  <td width="54%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:54.8%;">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">19</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='19',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Ancillary
Agreement<br>
under</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, Made and entered into by and between Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Employer&#148;) and J. Timothy
Griffin (the &#147;Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Employer has established a nonqualified plan of
deferred compensation for the benefit of a select group of management or highly
compensated employees currently set forth in a document entitled &#147;Northwest
Airlines Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#148;
(hereinafter the &#147;2001 SERP Restatement&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Plan maintained pursuant to the 2001 SERP Restatement
(sometimes referred to as the &#147;SERP&#148;) contemplates that certain terms and
provisions may be varied pursuant to a separate written agreement by and
between Employer and Participant known as an &#147;Ancillary Agreement&#148;; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Employer and the Participant agree that upon
executing this Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s SERP benefit will be computed
under and governed solely by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement and not
Part&nbsp;A of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY AGREED</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, By and between Employer and Participant as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">19)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DATE OF PARTICIPATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Participant&#146;s effective date for the
commencement of SERP participation is June&nbsp;1, 2001.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">20)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SPECIAL ARRANGEMENTS</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. For the purpose of computing Participant&#146;s
benefits under the SERP, the following special rules shall apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; FAE Formula</b>.
For the purposes of computing Participant&#146;s Final Average Earnings Annuity
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(a)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement,
Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased annually by two
(2)&nbsp;additional deemed years of Benefit Service for each actual year of
employment completed by the Participant after the Participant&#146;s effective date
for the commencement of SERP participation (not to exceed ten additional deemed
years over and above the actual Benefit Service).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">b)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Increased Pay Credit
Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s applicable
pay credit percentage pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the
2001 SERP Restatement the Participant shall receive (during the period from
June&nbsp;1, 2001 through May&nbsp;31, 2006) three times the pay credit that
the Participant would otherwise be entitled to receive (i.e., the &#147;actual&#148; plus
two &#147;deemed&#148;). Therefore, the Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
during the following periods shall be as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->With&nbsp;respect&nbsp;to&nbsp;Participant&#146;s&nbsp;Earnings<br>
  attributable&nbsp;to&nbsp;the&nbsp;following&nbsp;periods:</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Participant&#146;s<br>
  applicable&nbsp;pay&nbsp;credit<br>
  percentage&nbsp;shall&nbsp;be:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2001 to April
  30, 2002</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">May 1, 2002 to May 31,
  2002</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2002 to May 31,
  2003</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2003 to May 31,
  2004</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2004 to May 31,
  2005</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">

  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">45</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2005 to May 31, 2006</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">45</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>

</div>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">c)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Generally Applicable
Pay Credit Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s
applicable pay credit percentage pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">20</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='20',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Restatement during periods
subsequent to May&nbsp;31, 2006, Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
shall be determined under the generally applicable rules of the Pension Plan;
provided, however, that in applying those rules, Participant&#146;s actual Benefit
Service shall be increased by all additional deemed years of Benefit Service.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">21)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSENT TO AMENDMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.1
of the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(1995 Statement),&#148; Participant consents to the amendments of that document that
are embodied in the restatement of that document previously adopted by
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 SERP Restatement).&#148; Participant acknowledges
prior receipt of a copy of that document. Participant acknowledges that the
benefits payable to or with respect to Participant under the SERP shall be
governed exclusively by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">22)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; INTEGRATION</b>.
This agreement is intended to be and is an Ancillary Agreement as that term is
used in the SERP. Insofar as this Ancillary Agreement relates to Participant&#146;s
entitlement under the SERP, this Ancillary Agreement represents the entire
agreement of Participant and Employer and supercedes all prior agreements and
understandings, written or otherwise. In no event shall this Ancillary
Agreement and any other agreement be construed or interpreted to provide
duplicate benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Employer and Participant have
executed this Ancillary Agreement as of October&nbsp;25, 2001.</font></p>

 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">21</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='21',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Ancillary
Agreement<br>
under</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS AGREEMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, Made and entered into by and between Northwest
Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, (the &#147;Employer&#148;) and Philip C.
Haan (the &#147;Participant&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, Employer has established a nonqualified plan of
deferred compensation for the benefit of a select group of management or highly
compensated employees currently set forth in a document entitled &#147;Northwest Airlines
Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (2001 Restatement)&#148; (hereinafter the &#147;2001
SERP Restatement&#148;); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Plan maintained pursuant to the 2001 SERP
Restatement (sometimes referred to as the &#147;SERP&#148;) contemplates that certain
terms and provisions may be varied pursuant to a separate written agreement by
and between Employer and Participant known as an &#147;Ancillary Agreement&#148;; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">WHEREAS, The Employer and the Participant agree that upon
executing this Ancillary Agreement, Participant&#146;s SERP benefit will be computed
under and governed solely by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement and not
Part&nbsp;A of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY AGREED</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">, By and between Employer and Participant as
follows:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">23)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">DATE OF PARTICIPATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Participant&#146;s effective date for the
commencement of SERP participation is June&nbsp;1, 2001.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">24)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">SPECIAL ARRANGEMENTS</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. For the purpose of computing Participant&#146;s
benefits under the SERP, the following special rules shall apply.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; FAE Formula</b>.
For the purposes of computing Participant&#146;s Final Average Earnings Annuity
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(a)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement,
Participant&#146;s actual Benefit Service shall be increased annually by two
(2)&nbsp;additional deemed years of Benefit Service for each actual year of
employment completed by the Participant after the Participant&#146;s effective date
for the commencement of SERP participation (not to exceed ten additional deemed
years over and above the actual Benefit Service).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">b)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Increased Pay Credit
Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s applicable
pay credit percentage pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the
2001 SERP Restatement the Participant shall receive (during the period from
June&nbsp;1, 2001 through May&nbsp;31, 2006) three times the pay credit that
the Participant would otherwise be entitled to receive (i.e., the &#147;actual&#148; plus
two &#147;deemed&#148;). Therefore, the Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
during the following periods shall be as follows:</font></p>

<div align="center" style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p align="left" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableCenter -->With&nbsp;respect&nbsp;to&nbsp;Participant&#146;s&nbsp;Earnings<br>
  attributable&nbsp;to&nbsp;the&nbsp;following&nbsp;periods:</p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Participant&#146;s<br>
  applicable&nbsp;pay&nbsp;credit<br>
  percentage&nbsp;shall&nbsp;be:</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2001 to May 31,
  2002</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2002 to October
  31, 2002</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">November 1, 2002 to May
  31, 2003</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2003 to May 31,
  2004</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">June 1, 2004 to April
  30, 2005</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:72.3pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.15pt;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="334" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:250.7pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">May 1, 2005 to May 31,
  2005</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:12.0pt;">

  </td>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">22</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='22',FILE='C:\JMS\pradee\07-5449-1\task1868724\5449-1-kw-15.htm',USER='105238',CD='Mar 15 12:56 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">c)<b>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CB Generally Applicable
Pay Credit Percentage</b>. For the purpose of determining Participant&#146;s
applicable pay credit percentage pursuant to
Section&nbsp;4.1.1(b)(1)(iii)&nbsp;of the 2001 SERP Restatement during periods
subsequent to May&nbsp;31, 2006, Participant&#146;s applicable pay credit percentage
shall be determined under the generally applicable rules of the Pension Plan;
provided, however, that in applying those rules, Participant&#146;s actual Benefit
Service shall be increased by all additional deemed years of Benefit Service.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">25)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">CONSENT TO AMENDMENT</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.1
of the &#147;Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(1995 Statement),&#148; Participant consents to the amendments of that document that
are embodied in the restatement of that document previously adopted by
Northwest Airlines,&nbsp;Inc. known as the &#147;Northwest Airlines Supplemental
Executive Retirement Plan (2001 SERP Restatement).&#148; Participant acknowledges
prior receipt of a copy of that document. Participant acknowledges that the
benefits payable to or with respect to Participant under the SERP shall be
governed exclusively by Part&nbsp;B of the 2001 SERP Restatement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">26)</font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">INTEGRATION</font></b><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This agreement is intended to be and is an Ancillary Agreement as that
term is used in the SERP. Insofar as this Ancillary Agreement relates to
Participant&#146;s entitlement under the SERP, this Ancillary Agreement represents
the entire agreement of Participant and Employer and supercedes all prior
agreements and understandings, written or otherwise. In no event shall this
Ancillary Agreement and any other agreement be construed or interpreted to
provide duplicate benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Employer and Participant have
executed this Ancillary Agreement as of October&nbsp;25, 2001.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.31
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>a07-5449_1ex10d31.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.31
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit
10.31</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST AMENDMENT<br>
OF<br>
NORTHWEST AIRLINES<br>
SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN<br>
(2001 Restatement)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:45.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The &#147;NORTHWEST AIRLINES SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE
RETIREMENT PLAN (2001 Restatement)&#148; adopted by NORTHWEST AIRLINES, INC., a
Minnesota corporation (the &#147;Principal Sponsor&#148;), on October&nbsp;25, 2001, but
effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2001 (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;2001 SERP
Restatement&#148;), is hereby amended in the following respects:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;layout-grid-mode:char;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>KEY EMPLOYEES
UNDER 409A.&#160; Effective as of January 1,
2005, Section&nbsp;4.1.2 of Part B of the 2001 SERP Restatement is amended to
read in full as follows:</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.1.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Form
of Payment</b>.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 105.35pt;text-indent:-60.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>This
benefit (minus the withholding, payroll and other taxes which must be deducted
therefrom) shall be paid to the Participant directly from the general assets of
Northwest Airlines, Inc.&#160; Payment shall
be made in a single lump sum payment as soon as administratively feasible after
Termination of Employment.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 105.35pt;text-indent:-60.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
the forgoing paragraph&nbsp;(a), if payment is to be made on account of a Termination
of Employment to a key employee (as defined in section&nbsp;416(i)) of the
Code, payment of the portions of that Participant&#146;s benefits that (i)&nbsp;are
accrued before January&nbsp;1, 2005 but become Vested as of a date after
December&nbsp;31, 2004, and (ii)&nbsp;are accrued after December&nbsp;31, 2004,
shall not be made under paragraph&nbsp;(a) above before the date that is six
(6) months after the date of the Termination of Employment but shall be paid as
soon as administratively feasible after the date that is six (6) months after
the date of the Termination of Employment.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;layout-grid-mode:char;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>409A
COMPLIANCE.&#160; Effective as of January 1,
2005, Section&nbsp;9.1 of Part B of the 2001 SERP Restatement is amended by
adding the following sentences at the end thereto:</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">When the term &#147;Termination of Employment&#148; is used in
connection with benefits that were both accrued and Vested before
January&nbsp;1, 2005, that term shall have the same meaning ascribed to it as
in the Pension Plan documents.&#160; When the
term &#147;Termination of Employment&#148; is used in the Plan document in connection
with benefits that are (i)&nbsp;accrued before January&nbsp;1, 2005 but Vested
after December&nbsp;31, 2004; or (ii)&nbsp;accrued after December&nbsp;31, 2004
and Vested after December&nbsp;31, 2004, it shall be construed to have the same
meaning consistent with the term &#147;separation from service&#148; as used in
section&nbsp;409A of the Code.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\arajak\07-5449-1\task1867934\5449-1-ji.htm',USER='105328',CD='Mar 15 09:32 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;layout-grid-mode:char;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CONSENT
REQUIRED.&#160; As required by Section 6.1 of
Part B of the 2001 SERP Restatement, no part of this First Amendment shall be
effective as to any individual who was a Participant on the date this First
Amendment is adopted unless that Participant consents in writing to the First
Amendment.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;layout-grid-mode:char;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SAVINGS
CLAUSE.&#160; Save and except as hereinabove
expressly amended, the 2001 SERP Restatement will continue in full force and
effect.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">2</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\arajak\07-5449-1\task1867934\5449-1-ji.htm',USER='105328',CD='Mar 15 09:32 2007' -->
