 </tr>
</table>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES CORPORATION<br>
2001 STOCK INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Non-Qualified
Stock Option Agreement</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">THIS NON-QUALIFIED STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT (the &#147;Agreement&#148;)
dated as of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; is entered into between NORTHWEST AIRLINES
CORPORATION, a Delaware corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and&nbsp;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; , an employee of the
Company or a Subsidiary (as defined herein) of the Company (the &#147;Optionee&#148;),
pursuant to and subject to the terms and conditions of the Northwest Airlines
Corporation 2001 Stock Incentive Plan (as amended, the &#147;Plan&#148;). The purpose of
this Agreement is to evidence the terms and conditions of one or more
non-qualified stock options granted to the Optionee under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Accordingly, for good and valuable consideration, the
parties agree as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">ARTICLE 1. DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">All capitalized terms used in this Agreement and the
Schedule shall have the meaning given them in the Plan or as set forth below,
unless the context indicates otherwise.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Cause</i>&#148; shall mean with respect to the
termination of the Optionee&#146;s employment with the Company or a Subsidiary of
the Company: (i)&nbsp;an act or acts of personal dishonesty by the Optionee
intended to result in substantial personal enrichment of the Optionee at the
expense of the Company or a Subsidiary, (ii)&nbsp;an act or acts of personal
dishonesty by the Optionee intended to cause substantial injury to the Company
or a Subsidiary, (iii)&nbsp;material breach (other than as a result of a Disability)
by the Optionee of the Optionee&#146;s obligations under the terms and conditions of
the Optionee&#146;s employment, which action was (A)&nbsp;undertaken without a
reasonable belief that the action was in the best interests of the Company or a
Subsidiary and (B)&nbsp;not remedied within a reasonable period of time after
receipt of written notice from the Company or a Subsidiary specifying the
alleged breach, or (iv)&nbsp;the conviction of the Optionee of a felony.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Change in Control</i>&#148; shall mean one or more
of the following:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(i)&nbsp;The acquisition by any individual, entity
or group (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;13(d)(3) or 14(d)(2) of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;)) (a &#147;Person&#148;), other than
one or more Permitted Holders or their Related Parties or any group comprised
exclusively of Permitted Holders or their Related Parties, of beneficial
ownership (within the meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 and 13d-5 promulgated under
the Exchange Act, except that such person shall be deemed to have &#147;beneficial
ownership&#148; of all shares that any such Person has the right to acquire, whether
such right is exercisable immediately or only after the passage of time) of 20%
or more (or, if such Person is an Institutional Investor (as such term is
defined in the Rights Agreement dated as of November&nbsp;20, 1998 between
Northwest Airlines Corporation and Norwest Bank Minnesota, N.A.), 25% or more),
of either (A)&nbsp;the then outstanding shares of Common Stock of the Company
(or its successor by merger, consolidation or purchase of all or substantially
all of its assets) (the &#147;Outstanding Common Stock&#148;) or (B)&nbsp;the combined
voting power of the then outstanding voting securities of the Company (or its
successor by merger, consolidation or purchase of all or substantially all of
its assets) entitled to vote generally in the election of directors (the &#147;Outstanding
Voting Securities&#148;), and (ii)&nbsp;the Permitted Holders or their Related
Parties collectively &#147;beneficially own&#148; (within the meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3
promulgated under the Exchange Act) a lesser percentage of that which is
described in each of clause&nbsp;(A) and </font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(B)&nbsp;above and do not have
the right or ability by voting power, contract or otherwise to elect or
designate for election a majority of the board of directors of the Company or
such successor;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Individuals who, as of the date hereof, constitute
the Board of Directors of the Company (the &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;) cease for any
reason to constitute at least a majority of such Board; <i>provided, however</i>, that any individual
becoming a director subsequent to the date hereof, whose election, or
nomination for election by the Company&#146;s stockholders, was approved by a vote
of at least a majority of the directors then comprising the Incumbent Board
shall be considered as though such individual were a member of the Incumbent
Board, but excluding, for this purpose, any such individual whose initial
assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election
contest with respect to the election or removal of directors or other actual or
threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person
other than the Board of Directors of the Company; or</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Consummation by the Company of a reorganization,
merger or consolidation or sale or other disposition of all or substantially all
of the assets of the Company (a &#147;Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless,
following such Business Combination, (i)&nbsp;all or substantially all of the
individuals and entities who were the beneficial owners, respectively, of the
Outstanding Common Stock and Outstanding Voting Securities immediately prior to
such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, more than
50% of, respectively, the then outstanding shares of common stock and the
combined voting power of the then outstanding voting securities entitled to
vote generally in the election of directors, as the case may be, of the
corporation resulting from such Business Combination (including, without
limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction owns the Company
or all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets either directly or through
one or more subsidiaries) in substantially the same proportions as their
ownership immediately prior to such Business Combination of the Outstanding
Common Stock and Outstanding Voting Securities, as the case may be, and
(ii)&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of the
corporation resulting from such Business Combination were members of the
Incumbent Board at the time of the execution of the initial agreement or of the
action of such Board providing for such Business Combination; or</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Approval by the stockholders of the Company of a
complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Committee</i>&#148; shall mean the Compensation
Committee of the Company&#146;s Board of Directors or any other committee of the
Board performing similar functions as appointed from time to time by the Board
to administer the Plan or any subcommittee thereof constituted so as to contain
at least two &#147;Outside Directors&#148; as that term is defined under
Section&nbsp;162(m) of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Common Stock</i>&#148; shall mean the common stock,
par value $.01 per share, of the Company or such other securities or property
as may become subject to an Option granted hereunder as a result of an
adjustment made pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.2 hereof.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Disability</i>&#148; shall mean the Optionee&#146;s
physical or mental condition which prevents continued performance of his or her
duties and for which the Optionee establishes by medical evidence that such
condition will be permanent and continuous during the remainder of the Optionee&#146;s
life or is likely to be of at least three (3)&nbsp;years&#146; duration.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Expiration Date</i>&#148; shall mean, with respect
to each Option granted hereunder, the date on which the Option shall expire
pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.4 hereof, unless terminated earlier pursuant to
Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Fair Market Value</i>&#148; shall mean, with
respect to a share of Common Stock, the average of the opening and closing sale
prices of shares of Common Stock as reported on the NASDAQ National Market
System as of a specified date or, if such System is not open for trading on
such date, on the day closest to such date when such System is open for
trading.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Good Reason</i>&#148; shall mean any one or more of
the following:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">a material reduction in the Optionee&#146;s
compensation or other benefits;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">any material change in the Optionee&#146;s job
responsibilities; provided that, so long as the Optionee retains a substantial
part of his then current oversight responsibility, a transfer of a portion of
such oversight responsibility of the Optionee shall not in and of itself
constitute a material change in the Optionee&#146;s job responsibilities; and</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">the relocation of the Company&#146;s principal
executive offices to a location outside the Minneapolis-St. Paul Metropolitan
Area.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">In order for a Termination of Employment to be considered for Good
Reason, such termination must occur within one (1)&nbsp;year after the event
giving rise to such Good Reason. The Optionee&#146;s continued employment shall not
constitute consent to, or a waiver of rights with respect to, any circumstance
constituting Good Reason hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Grant Date</i>&#148; shall mean, with respect to
each Option granted hereunder, the date on which the Option is granted by the
Company to the Optionee pursuant to the provisions of the Plan, as specified on
the applicable Schedule.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Option</i>&#148; shall mean one or more
non-qualified stock options granted by the Company to the Optionee pursuant to
the provisions of the Plan on the terms set forth in the Plan, this Agreement
and the applicable Schedule pertaining to such option.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Option Term</i>&#148; shall mean, with respect to
each Option granted hereunder, the term of the Option set forth in
Section&nbsp;2.4 of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Permitted Holders</i>&#148; means each of Alfred A.
Checchi, Gary L. Wilson, Frederic V. Malek or Richard C. Blum and Richard C.
Blum&nbsp;&amp; Associates&#151;NWA Partners, L.P., and also includes the Company
and any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by the
Company or any corporation controlled by the Company.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Purchase Price</i>&#148; shall mean the price set
forth in Section&nbsp;2.3 of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Related Parties</i>&#148; with respect to any
Permitted Holders means (i)&nbsp;any spouse or immediate family member of such
Permitted Holder, any trust created primarily for the benefit of any such
individual or such individual&#146;s estate, executor, administrator, committee or
other personal representatives or beneficiaries; or (ii)&nbsp;any trust,
corporation, partnership or other entity, the beneficiaries, stockholders,
partners, owners or Persons beneficially holding a majority controlling
interest of which consist of one or more of such Permitted Holders and/or such
other Person referred to in the immediately preceding clause&nbsp;(i).</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Retirement</i>&#148; shall mean separation from
service with the Company or a Subsidiary pursuant to a pension or retirement
plan maintained by the Company or such Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Schedule</i>&#148; shall mean a Stock Option
Agreement Schedule in the form attached to this Agreement, which shall contain
the terms of one or more Options granted to the Optionee from time to time
pursuant to the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.17</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Secretary</i>&#148; shall mean the Secretary of the
Company.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Subsidiary</i>&#148; shall mean (i)&nbsp;any entity
that, directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, is controlled
by the Company, and (ii)&nbsp;any entity in which the Company has a significant
interest, in each case as determined by the Committee.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">1.19</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#147;<i>Termination of Employment</i>&#148; shall mean the
time when the employee-employer relationship between the Optionee and the
Company or any Subsidiary ceases for any reason whatsoever. The Optionee&#146;s
employment shall not be deemed to have been terminated because of absence from
active employment on account of temporary illness or during authorized vacation
or during temporary leaves of absence from active employment granted by the
Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">ARTICLE 2. THE OPTION(S)</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Number of Shares</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Pursuant
to the terms and provisions of the Plan, this Agreement and the applicable
Schedule, the Optionee is granted one or more Options to purchase all or any
portion of the number of shares of Common Stock set forth on the applicable
Schedule.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Adjustments in Shares</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. In
the event of any merger, reorganization, consolidation, sale of all or substantially
all of the assets of the Company, recapitalization, stock dividend, stock
split, reverse stock split or other change in corporate structure affecting the
Common Stock, and provided in the case of any of the foregoing transactions no
Change in Control has occurred or will occur in connection therewith, such
substitution or adjustment shall be made in the number and type of shares (or
other securities or other property) subject to the Option, to the extent not
theretofore exercised, and/or the Purchase Price of such shares, in each case
as may be determined to be appropriate by the Committee in its sole discretion,
provided that the number of shares subject to the Option shall always be a
whole number.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Purchase Price</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The
Purchase Price of the shares of Common Stock subject to an Option granted
hereunder shall be the price set forth on the applicable Schedule without
commission or other charge.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">2.4</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Option Term</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The term of
each Option granted hereunder shall be for a period of ten (10)&nbsp;years from
the Grant Date, subject to earlier termination as provided in Section&nbsp;3.2
hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">ARTICLE 3. EXERCISABILITY; TERMINATION</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Exercisability</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Subject to
the provisions of Sections 3.2 and 3.3 hereof, each Option granted hereunder,
to the extent not theretofore exercised, may be exercised at any time or from
time to time as to any portion or all of the shares subject to such Option in
accordance with the vesting schedule set forth on the applicable Schedule.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Termination</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.1<i> Retirement</i>. If a Termination of
Employment shall occur by reason of the Optionee&#146;s Retirement, any portion of
any Option granted hereunder that was exercisable as of the date of such
Retirement and not theretofore exercised, may be exercised by the Optionee at
any time within one (1)&nbsp;year after the date of such Retirement; <i>provided, however,</i> that if the Optionee
dies or becomes Disabled within one (1)&nbsp;year after such Retirement, then
any portion of any such Option that was exercisable as of the date of the
Optionee&#146;s Retirement and not theretofore exercised shall not terminate
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.2 and may be exercised during the remainder of
the term of the Option by the Optionee or by the estate of the Optionee or a
person who shall have acquired the right to exercise such Option by bequest or
inheritance. Any portion of an Option granted hereunder that was not
exercisable as of the date of such Retirement shall be canceled immediately
upon such Retirement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.2
<i>Death or Disability</i>. If a
Termination of Employment shall occur by reason of the Optionee&#146;s death or
Disability, then any portion of any Option granted hereunder that was
exercisable as of the date of such death or Disability and not theretofore
exercised shall not terminate and may be exercised during the remainder of the
term of such Option by the Optionee or by the estate of the Optionee or a
person who shall have acquired the right to exercise such Option by bequest or
inheritance. Any portion of an Option granted hereunder that was not
exercisable as of the date of such death or Disability shall be canceled
immediately upon such death or Disability.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.3
<i>Termination of Employment for Cause</i>.
If the Optionee&#146;s employment shall terminate for Cause, any Option granted
hereunder, to the extent not theretofore exercised, shall be canceled
immediately upon such Termination of Employment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.2.4
<i>Termination of Employment Other Than for
Cause, Death, Disability or Retirement</i>. If the employment of the
Optionee shall be terminated otherwise than by reason of Cause, death, </font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Disability or Retirement, any
portion of any Option granted hereunder that was exercisable as of the date of
such Termination of Employment and not theretofore exercised may be exercised
by the Optionee at any time within one (1)&nbsp;year after the date of such Termination
of Employment. Any portion of any such Option that was not exercisable as of
the date of such Termination of Employment shall be canceled immediately upon
such Termination of Employment.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">3.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Change in Control</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.
Notwithstanding any other provision of this Agreement, in the event of a Change
in Control, any Option granted hereunder (to the extent not theretofore
exercised or canceled) shall become immediately exercisable in full in
accordance with this Section&nbsp;3.3 and shall remain exercisable during the
remainder of the applicable Option Term:</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">If the Change in Control occurs pursuant to
Section&nbsp;1.2(a) hereof, any such Option shall become immediately
exercisable in full upon a Termination of Employment by the Company other than
for Cause or by the Participant with Good Reason (i)&nbsp;at any time after the
occurrence of the Change in Control or (ii)&nbsp;before the occurrence of the
Change in Control if such termination is in connection with such Change in
Control; and</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">If the Change in Control occurs pursuant to
Section&nbsp;1.2(b), (c)&nbsp;or (d)&nbsp;hereof, any such Option shall become
exercisable in full immediately upon the effective date of such Change in
Control.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">ARTICLE 4. EXERCISE OF OPTION; ISSUANCE OF SHARES</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Transferability</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The
Options granted hereunder may not be sold, transferred, pledged, assigned or
otherwise alienated or hypothecated and shall not be subject to execution,
attachment or similar process. Any attempted sale, transfer, pledge,
assignment, hypothecation or other disposition of any Option contrary to the
provisions hereof, or the levy of any execution, attachment or similar process
upon any such Option, shall be null and void and without effect. In addition,
the Options may be exercised during the lifetime of the Optionee only by the Optionee.
Notwithstanding the foregoing, the designation of a beneficiary by the Optionee
does not constitute such transfer and, after the death of the Optionee, any
exercisable portion of the Options may be exercised by the estate of the
Optionee or by a person who shall have acquired the right to exercise the
Options by bequest or inheritance in accordance with the provisions of Sections
3.2.1 and 3.2.2.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Manner of Exercise</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.
Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Option granted
hereunder, or any portion thereof, may be exercised by delivery of written
notice of such exercise to the Company at its principal office at 5101
Northwest Drive, St. Paul, Minnesota 55111-3034, Attention of the Secretary.
Such notice shall state the election to exercise an Option granted hereunder,
the Date of Grant of the Option being exercised and the number of shares in
respect of which such Option is being exercised (which shall not be less than
one hundred (100)&nbsp;shares) and shall be signed by the person or persons so
exercising the Option. Such notice shall be accompanied by payment of the full
Purchase Price of such shares in the following manner:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.1
in United States dollars in cash or by check, bank draft or money order payable
to the order of the Company;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.2
through the delivery of shares of Common Stock with an aggregate Fair Market
Value on the exercise date equal to the Purchase Price;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.3
by delivery of irrevocable instructions to a financial institution to sell the
shares of Common Stock acquired upon exercise of the Option or a sufficient
portion thereof and remit promptly to the Company the portion of the sale or
loan proceeds sufficient to pay the Purchase Price;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.4
by the withholding of shares of Common Stock otherwise to be delivered upon
exercise of the Option with a Fair Market Value on the date of exercise equal
to the Purchase Price; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.2.5
by any combination of the above methods of payment or by such other means and
in such other forms as the Committee shall approve.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Such notice shall also be accompanied by payment of all amounts which
the Company is required under federal, state or local law to withhold upon the
exercise of the Option. In the event that the Option shall be exercised,
pursuant to Sections 3.2.1 or 3.2.2 hereof, by any person or persons other than
the Optionee, such notice shall be accompanied by appropriate proof of the
right of such person or persons to exercise the Option.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">4.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Issuance of Shares of Common Stock</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The certificate or certificates for the shares as to which an Option
shall have been exercised in the manner set forth in Section&nbsp;4.2 hereof
shall be registered in the name of the person or persons so exercising the
Option and shall be delivered after payment of the full Purchase Price and any
applicable withholding taxes to or upon the written order of the person or
persons exercising the Option. All shares that shall be purchased upon the
exercise of an Option shall be fully paid and non-assessable. Anything in this
Agreement to the contrary notwithstanding, the obligation of the Company to
sell and deliver shares of Common Stock upon exercise of an Option shall be
subject to all applicable laws, rules and regulations and such approvals by any
governmental agencies as may be required, including, without limitation, the
effectiveness of a registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933, as
amended, as deemed necessary or appropriate by counsel for the Company and such
shares having been approved for trading on the NASDAQ National Market System.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">ARTICLE 5. MISCELLANEOUS</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.1</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Administration</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The
Committee shall have the power to interpret the Plan and this Agreement and to
adopt such rules for the administration, interpretation and application of the
Plan as are consistent therewith and to interpret or revoke any such rules. All
actions taken and all interpretations and determinations made by the Committee
shall be final and binding upon the Optionee, the Company and all other
interested persons. No member of the Committee shall be personally liable for any
action, determination or interpretation made in good faith with respect to the
Plan or the Option. In its absolute discretion, the Board of Directors of the
Company may at any time and from time to time exercise any and all rights and
duties of the Committee under the Plan and this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.2</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Termination of Employment</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">.
For purposes of the Option, the Committee, in its absolute discretion, shall
determine the effect of all matters and questions relating to Termination of
Employment, including, without limitation, all questions of whether particular
leaves of absence constitute Terminations of Employment and whether any
re-employment by the Company shall be deemed to be simultaneous with
termination.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.3</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Plan Does Not Confer Employment or Stockholder Rights</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Nothing in this Agreement shall confer upon the
Optionee any right to continue in the employ of the Company or any Subsidiary
or interfere in any way with the right of the Company or any Subsidiary to
terminate the employment of the Optionee at any time. Neither the Optionee nor
any person entitled to exercise the Optionee&#146;s rights in the event of the
Optionee&#146;s death shall have any of the rights of a stockholder of the Company
with respect to the shares subject to an Option except and to the extent that,
and until, such shares shall have been issued by the Company upon the exercise
of the Option.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.4</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Shares to be Reserved</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The
Company shall at all times during the term of any Option granted hereunder
reserve and keep available such number of shares of Common Stock as will be
sufficient to satisfy the requirements of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.5</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Titles</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Titles are
provided herein for convenience only and are not to serve as a basis for
interpretation or construction of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.6</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Amendment</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This Agreement
may be amended only by a writing executed by the parties hereto which
specifically states that it is amending this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.7</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Governing Law</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. The laws of
the State of Delaware shall govern the interpretation, validity and performance
of the terms of this Agreement regardless of the law that might be applied
under principles of conflicts of laws.</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\zaria\07-5449-1\task1868136\5449-1-kz.htm',USER='105281',CD='Mar 15 12:13 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.8</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Jurisdiction</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. Any suit,
action or proceeding against the Optionee with respect to this Agreement, or
any judgment entered by any court in respect of any thereof, may be brought in
any court of competent jurisdiction in the States of Delaware, Minnesota or New
York, as the Company may elect in its sole discretion, and the Optionee hereby
submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of such courts for the purpose of any
such suit, action, proceeding or judgment.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.9</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Notices</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. All notices and
other communications provided for herein shall be in writing and shall be
deemed to have been duly given if delivered by hand (whether by overnight
courier or otherwise) or sent by registered or certified mail, return receipt
requested, postage prepaid, to the party to whom it is directed:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.9.1
If to the Company, to it at the following address:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 144.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Northwest Airlines Corporation<br>
5101 Northwest Drive<br>
St. Paul, Minnesota 55111-3034<br>
Attn: Secretary</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 54.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.9.2
If to the Optionee, to him at the address set forth on the applicable Schedule;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">or at such other address as either party shall from time to time specify
by notice in writing to the other.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">5.10</font><i><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Counterparts</font></i><font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">. This
Agreement may be executed in two or more counterparts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Agreement has been executed and
delivered by the parties hereto as of the date set forth above.</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Date&nbsp;of&nbsp;Schedule:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></i></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES CORPORATION<br>
2001 STOCK INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Stock Option
Agreement Schedule</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">This STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT SCHEDULE (the &#147;Schedule&#148;)
dated as of the date set forth above is issued by Northwest Airlines
Corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;) to the Optionee named below pursuant to the Stock
Option Agreement (the &#147;Agreement&#148;) dated as of February&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
between the Company and the Optionee. This Schedule sets forth the terms of an
Option granted to the Optionee pursuant to the Company&#146;s 2001 Stock Incentive
Plan, as amended (the &#147;Plan&#148;). This Schedule is subject to the provisions of
the Plan and the Agreement. All terms not defined in this Schedule shall have
the meanings given to them in the Agreement and the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">Optionee Information:</font></u></b></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 12.1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(DEBTOR-IN-POSSESSION)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">COMPUTATION OF RATIO OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Dollars in millions)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#151;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 2.25pt 0pt;width:3.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading -->(1)</p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Calculated as one-third of rentals, which is
  considered representative of the interest factor.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsequent to its Chapter 11 filing, the Company
  recorded post-petition interest expense on pre-petition</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">obligations only to the extent it believes the
  interest will be paid during the bankruptcy proceeding or that</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">it is probable that the interest will be an allowed
  claim.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Earnings were inadequate to cover fixed charges by
  $2.87 billion, $2.45 billion, $869 million, and $1.28 billion</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:3.94%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="96%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:96.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">for the years ended December 31, 2006, 2005, 2004,
  and 2002 respectively.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 12.2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NORTHWEST AIRLINES CORPORATION</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(DEBTOR-IN-POSSESSION)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">COMPUTATION OF RATIO OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AND PREFERRED STOCK REQUIREMENTS</font></b></p>

  income taxes and cumulative effect of accounting change</font></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2,864</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2,457</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:6.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">

  </td>

  charges and preferred stock requirements</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">745</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">

  </td>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">887</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">820</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.58%;">

  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.25</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)&#160;&#160; Calculated
as one-third of rentals, which is considered representative of the interest
factor.</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subsequent
to its Chapter 11 filing, the Company recorded post-petition interest expense
on pre-petition obligations only to the extent it believes the interest will be
paid during the bankruptcy proceeding or that it is probable that the interest
will be an allowed claim.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Earnings
were inadequate to cover fixed charges by $2.87 billion, $2.47 billion, $898
million, and $1.28 billion for the years ended December 31, 2006, 2005, 2004,
and 2002, respectively.</p>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<h3 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT&#160;&#160;
21.1</font></b></h3>

<h1 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NORTHWEST
AIRLINES CORPORATION</font></b></h1>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">LIST OF SUBSIDIARIES</font></u></b></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(wholly-owned unless otherwise specified)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Northwest
Airlines Corporation (Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Northwest Airlines Holdings Corporation
(Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; NWA Inc. (Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Northwest Airlines, Inc.
(Minnesota corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;text-indent:-67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Win-Win L.P. (Delaware
limited partnership) *</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;text-indent:-67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Wings Finance Y.K.
(Japanese limited liability company)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 63.0pt;text-indent:4.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NWA Fuel Services Corporation
(New York corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Montana Enterprises, Inc. (Montana
corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Tomisato
Shoji Kabushiki Kaisha (Japan corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NWA Worldclub, Inc. (Wisconsin corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NWA Real Estate Holding Company LLC (Delaware
limited liability company)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NW Red Baron LLC (Delaware limited liability
company)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 67.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Margoon Holding B.V. (Netherlands
corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft Foreign Sales, Inc. (U.S. Virgin
Islands corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Northwest Aerospace Training
Corporation (Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; MLT Inc. (Minnesota
corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; NWA Aircraft Finance, Inc.
(Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compass Airlines, Inc. (Delaware corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; NWA Retail Sales Inc.
(Minnesota corporation)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cardinal Insurance Company (Cayman) Ltd.
(Cayman Islands corporation)</font></p>

<div style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="1" width="160" noshade color="black" align="left" style="width:120.0pt;"></div>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Northwest Airlines, Inc. is 99% limited
partner</font></p>

</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-23.1
<SEQUENCE>14
<FILENAME>a07-5449_1ex23d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-23.1
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>






</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
23.1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consent
of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">We consent to the use of our
report dated March 13, 2007, with respect to the</font>  </font>consolidated financial statements, included
in this Annual Report (Form 10-K) of Northwest Airlines Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession).</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our audit also included the
financial statement schedule of Northwest Airlines</font>  </font>Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession) listed in
Item 15(a). This schedule is the responsibility
of Northwest Airlines Corporation&#146;s (Debtor-in-Possession) management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion
based on our audit. In our opinion, as to which the date is March 13, 2007, the financial statement schedule referred
to above, when considered in
relation to the basic financial statements taken as a whole, presents fairly in all material respects the information
set forth therein.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The financial statement
schedule does not include any adjustments to reflect the possible</font>  </font>future effects on the recoverability and
classification of assets or the amounts and classification of liabilities that may result from the outcome of the
uncertainty regarding the
Company&#146;s ability to continue as a going concern.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">We consent to the
incorporation by reference in the following Registration Statements</font>  </font>and the related Prospectuses:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Registration Statements on Form S-3 (Nos.
333-65588, 333-107070, 333-107068, and
333-113623) of Northwest Airlines Corporation and Northwest Airlines, Inc.,</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Registration Statements on Form S-4 (No.
333-105356) of Northwest Airlines Corporation
and Northwest Airlines, Inc., and  </p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Registration Statements on Form S-8 (Nos.
333-12571, 333-66253, 333-75933, 333-90648
and 333-90646) of Northwest Airlines Corporation;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">of
our report dated March 13, 2007, with respect to the consolidated financial
statements</font>  </font>of Northwest
Airlines Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession) included herein, our report dated March 13, 2007, with respect to
management&#146;s assessment of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting and the effectiveness of
internal control over financial
reporting of Northwest Airlines Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession), included herein, and our report included in the
preceding paragraph with respect to the financial statement schedule of Northwest Airlines
Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession) included in this Annual Report (Form 10-K) of Northwest Airlines Corporation (Debtor-in-Possession).</p>
