<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>15
<FILENAME>a07-5449_1ex31d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.1
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">


<h4 align="right" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT 31.1</font></b></h4>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification by the Chief Executive Officer</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Pursuant to
Section 302 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I,
Douglas M. Steenland, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form
10-K of Northwest Airlines Corporation;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not
contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material
fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under
which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period
covered by this report;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3. Based on my knowledge, the financial
statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly
present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations
and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this
report;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. The registrant&#146;s other certifying officers
and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and
procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and
internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules
13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a) Designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
report is being prepared;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b) Designed such internal control over
financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting
to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding
the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial
statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted
accounting principles;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the
registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report
our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and
procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such
evaluation; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d) Disclosed in this report any change in the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the
registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter
in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably
likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5. The registrant&#146;s other certifying officers
and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control
over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee
of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent
functions):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a) All significant deficiencies and material
weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial
reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s
ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that
involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-indent:36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT 31.2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification by the Chief Financial Officer</font></b></p>

10-K of Northwest Airlines Corporation;</font></p>

fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under
which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered
by this report;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3. Based on my knowledge, the financial
statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly
present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations
and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. The registrant&#146;s other certifying officers
and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and
procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and
internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules
13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a) Designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 45.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b) Designed such internal control over
financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting
to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding
the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements
for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
principles;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the
registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report

procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">d) Disclosed in this report any change in the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the
registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter
in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably
likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 21.6pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5. The registrant&#146;s other certifying officers
and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control
over financial reporting, to the registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee
of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent
functions):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a) All significant deficiencies and material
weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial
reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s
ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 43.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that
involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-32.1
<SEQUENCE>17
<FILENAME>a07-5449_1ex32d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-32.1
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">


<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-indent:396.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT 32.1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification by the Chief Executive Officer Pursuant to</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as Adopted Pursuant to Section
906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:13.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with the annual report of Northwest Airlines Corporation
(the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K for the period ending December 31, 2006 as filed
with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;),
I, Douglas M. Steenland, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Company,
certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)
The Report fully complies with the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)
The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material
respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Date:
March 16, 2007</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">

<TYPE>EX-32.2
<SEQUENCE>18
<FILENAME>a07-5449_1ex32d2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-32.2

<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">


<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-indent:396.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT 32.2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certification by the Chief Financial Officer Pursuant to</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as Adopted Pursuant to Section
906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:13.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with the annual report of Northwest Airlines Corporation
(the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K for the period ending December 31, 2006 as filed
with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;),
I, Neal S. Cohen, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the
Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of
the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)
The Report fully complies with the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)
The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material
respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Date: March 16, 2007</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
